text: TWO RUSSIAN WARSHIPS, the ANATOLE and the CASSIOPEIA, approach a RUSSIAN OIL RIG in ARCTIC WATERS.
Karpov 60, an INTIMIDATING RUSSIAN GENERAL, CAPTAINS the WARSHIP. His SECOND IN COMMAND UMINSKI, 30's, stands at h side.
(to Uminski, in Russian) Hold this position.
Yes General.

300 RUSSIAN OIL RIG WORKERS are held PRISONER in the CARG HOLD of the RUSSIAN OIL RIG. They are surrounded by a ATLANTEAN HIJACKERS. The Atlante wear a combination of BLACK WET SUITS and ARMOR PLATING designed like FISH SCALES. Their faces are CONCEALED behi MASKS. Their HANDS and FEET are BARE. They wield STRANGE WEAPONRY which HUM with ENERGY. OKSANA, 40's, A HARDENED FEMALE OIL RIG WORKER cradles a frightened YOUNGER FEMALE OIL RIG WORKER, LUCYA, early 20 who SOBS in her arms.

(in Russian) It's Ok. It's Ok. MERA, a TALL, BEAUTIFUL REDHEAD ATLANTEAN walks past them and speaks with one of her Warriors. He BOWS to her and leaves. She walks towards a TALL MAN with LONG FLOWING hair who s on top of a stack of CRATES like a King on a THRONE. He i dressed in ARMOR. In his right hand he holds a LONG GOLDE TRIDENT. His left hand is SHIMMERING and BLUE as if MADE WATER. This is ORIN, KING OF THE ATLANTEANS.
(in Atlantean) Orin. The surface dwellers approach. Orin steps off the crates which are marked 'MERREVALE'.
(in Atlantean) Order the Warriors to set the charges.
And the prisoners?

They are pawns. When the charges are set put them in their life boats and release them. (he smiles) In the meantime let us welcome our guests. He leaves the Cargo Hold. Mera stays to watch over the Hostages.

TWO RUSSIAN HELICOPTERS hover above the MAIN PLATFORM. A SQUAD of TWELVE RUSSIAN COMMANDOES rappel down onto the Platform their MACHINE GUNS raised and ready. Orin emerges onto the Platform followed by a squad of his WARRIORS who carry with them LARGE CANNON-LIKE WEAPONS.
Get in formation. I'll attend to these. The King walks towards the Commandoes who AIM their GUNS him.
(firmly, in Russian) Drop your weapons and get down on your knees!
(in Russian) I kneel before no one. He SLAMS the HILT of his Trident DOWN. A COMMANDO notices an Atlantean Warrior placing a CANNON RAIL at the EDGE of the PLATFORM and pointing it towards Warships.

The Commando FIRES his weapon. The Bullets BOUNCE of the Atlantean armor but one PENETRATES the Warrior's leg. He BUCKLES and FALLS to his knees. With SUPERHUMAN speed Orin ATTACKS before the Commandos c even REACT.  3. He JUMPS high into the air and LANDS in the MIDDLE of the Commandos. With LETHAL EFFICIENCY he DISPATCHES the Commandos. SLICI their ARMS and STABBING them THROUGH the LEGS with his TRIDENT. He KICKS the Commando Leader CLEAR ACROSS the platform as the rest fall to the floor DISABLED and in PAIN but ALIVE The King turns to his Warriors and nods.

The Warriors place the CANNONS on the RAIL and FIRE on th Anatole. BLUE BOLTS of DESTRUCTIVE ENERGY fire towards the Warship The Energy IMPACTS the HULLS of the Ship sending WAVES of ENERGY through the vessel which INCAPACITATES the CREW wh CRUMBLE to the floor, UNCONSCIOUS.
Karpov sees the other Warship being DISABLED.
(to Uminski) Call in the Fighters. Uminski activates his radio.
THREE RUSSIAN T-50 FIGHTER JETS fly high above the Arctic waters.
The PILOT listens to his orders.
What are my orders?
Request immediate attack. Terminate the hostiles.
Affirmit... The Pilot pauses as he sees SOMETHING outside of the COCKPIT.
Two FAMILIAR RED BOOTS walk up the NOSE of the Jet toward the cockpit. The Pilot looks up as a RED CAPE BILLOWS outside the Jet.
Uminski and Karpov watch as the T-50 fly past without completing the Airstrike.
(into radio) Request immediate attack. Repeat Immediate attack. There is no response
No response sir. Karpov SUCKS his teeth and PONDERS his options. Uminski looks to the sky and his eyes WIDEN.
(shocked) Sir! Karpov looks up.
Orin and his Warriors look to the sky as they hear the CR of a SONIC BOOM. A RED and BLUE BLUR CRASHES down through the COMPLEX.
(smiles) Sky Dweller.

The Red and Blue blur SMASHES down through the CEILING an down onto the FLOOR. The Hostages SCREAM and COWER as the Atlanteans raise the ENERGY WEAPONS. Mera CALMLY steps backwards and takes COVER behind a BULKHEAD DOOR and WATCHES. The DEBRIS and DUST settle and standing on the DENTED flo in the middle of the Cargo Hold between the Hostages and Atlanteans is the MAN OF STEEL, KAL EL... SUPERMAN. An Atlantean Warrior RUSHES Superman with his Weapon RAIS

(calmly) I'd put those toys away. Superman GRABS the BARREL of the Weapon and CRUSHES it wi EASE. The other Atlanteans OPEN FIRE. BOLTS of CRACKLING BLUE ENERGY strike Superman REPEATEDLY. He STAGGERS back as th energy PASSES THROUGH his BODY. He SHAKES it off.

(bemused) That's new. Superman tries to pull the Weapon away from the Atlantean But to the Kryptonian's SURPRISE the Warrior RESISTS. The Warrior seems to be SMILING beneath his Mask. Superman PULLS harder and the Atlantean is YANKED OFF his feet entirely and TOSSED aside. Superman then with SUPERHUMAN SPEED attacks the remaining Warriors as they OPEN FIRE on his again. He DEFLECTS their ENERGY BOLTS and DISARMS them DESTROYIN their Weapons and SCATTERING their parts across the Cargo Hold. He CRISS-CROSSES the interior of the complex SUBDUING the Warriors before coming to a HALT in front of the Hostages They RECOIL from him and COWER
Don't be afraid. (reaches out his hand) I'm here to help. Lucya stands up and walks up to the Man of Steel and look into his KIND EYES and places her hand in his.
(in English) There are others.
I know. I'll take care of them. Can you lead these people to the life boats? She nods. Superman smiles.
(to Mera) I'm giving you once chance to surrender. That's more than those Warships will.
(in English) How many chances will they give you? Superman looks up through the HOLE in the Rig's Roof. Standing above him LOOKING DOWN upon him is Orin.
Before they kill you? Superman LIFTS of the floor and FLOATS up through the hol and HOVERS over Orin before LANDING to face him.
They only killers here are you and your terrorists. Disarm the bombs you've planted.
I don't kill without justification. (gestures to the Warships) Unlike them.
The people here are innocent.
And I will release them and (gestures to the rig) destroy this abomination.
I can't allow you to do that.
Their machines poison my oceans. Ruin the Earth. There is nothing of this world but rot, decay and death. (points Trident at Superman) And you would be it's champion?
I would be it's protector.
Why? Humans hate what they don't understand and they can never understand someone like you. (softly) I know this.
You've been destroying oil installations all over the planet. This has to stop.

I will never stop. I do this to protect my people like you protect theirs. Superman sees Atlanteans on the Platform CHARGING up thei ENERGY CANNONS. Before they can fire Superman uses his HEAT VISION to DESTROY the Cannons. The Warriors are sent HURTLING backwards from the BLAST. Orin STRIKES Superman across the JAW with the HILT of his TRIDENT and then STABS it toward his CHEST. Superman CATCHES the Trident as Orin LUNGES forward DRIVI Superman backwards. Superman STEADIES himself. He looks at Orin's SHIMMERING LEFT HAND.
(confused) What are you?

More like you than they can ever be. Superman GRIPS the Trident and SWING Orin over his head a SMASHES him down INTO the Platform floor. Orin FLIPS to his feet and SLICES the Trident ACROSS Superman's CHEST cutting THREE SLASHES In his SYMBOL OF HOPE. Superman and Orin CHARGE at each other.
Uminski watches as Superman and Orin BATTLE on top of the PLATFORM. Karpov is on the radio awaiting orders.
(to himself, in awe) They are Gods! Karpov receives his orders.
(to Uminski) Open fire on the installation.
(reluctant) That would sink it. There are 300 civilians on board.
You have your orders. Uminski takes a DEEP BREATH.
(firmly) No. Karpov turns gestures TWO SAILORS to REMOVE Uminski from Bridge.
(disgusted) Get this coward out of here! Uminski is ESCORTED out.
(firmly) Open fire!
Orin is sent. SKIDDING backwards across the Platform. He STABS his Trident into the FLOOR to stop his MOMENTUM. He smiles.
You're holding back.

Because I don't want to kill you. The ROAR of ARTILLERY FIRE fills the AIR. A SHELLS impact the Installation. The EXPLOSIONS SHAKE th Oil Rig. Another Shell DETONATES between Superman and Orin SEPARAT them. Superman JUMPS into the air and FLIES toward the Warship.
Karpov sees the Man of Steel approaching.
(frantic) Fire! Fire! Fire!

The Warship OPEN FIRE on Superman who PUNCHES the SHELLS from the sky and FLIES over the Warship and uses his HEAT VISION to DESTROY the ARTILLERY CANNONS and then DIVES do through the BRIDGE. Karpov THROWS himself to the floor on impact. Superman stands over the TERRIFIED General. Before he can anything he HEARS the SCREAMING of the Oil Rig Workers. He leaves and flies back towards the CRIPPLED Rig.

He lands inside and lands in a SMOKING HALLWAY. He HEARS someone STRUGGLING. He SWIFTLY follows the sound Mera is PINNED beneath a fallen BULKHEAD DOOR. Her STOMAC has been WOUNDED. She's BLEEDING HEAVILY. Superman LIFTS the DOOR off of her and TAKES her in his a and FLIES her out of the Hallway and out onto the Platfor He lays her down gently.

I can help you. Please trust me. He uses his HEAT VISION to CAUTERIZE the wound. She GRITS her teeth trying not to scream. Superman finishes and she goes LIMP. Superman looks up from Mera and sees Orin WATCHING him. Behind him his Warriors stand WEAPONS READY and AIMED at Man of Steel. Superman stands.

She needs help. Take her and leave. Orin STRAPS his Trident ACROSS HIS BACK and lifts Mera GENTLY in his arms. As he leaves he looks back on Superman for a moment. Orin DIVES OFF the Platform and into the Ocean and SWIMS AMAZING SPEED into the DEPTHS. His Warriors follow. Suddenly the 0il Rig is ROCKED by a huge EXPLOSION at it' BASE and begins to TILT and SINK into the Ocean.  10.
Water RUSHES into the Cargo Hold and ENGULFS the Workers. Oksana grabs Lucya and stops her from being DRAGGED away the CURRENT.

location: PLATFORM, RUSSIAN OIL RIG, ARCTIC WATERS

text: Superman FLIES up into the sky then DOWN INTO the OCEAN.
The Workers are totally SUBMERGED and and SECONDS away fr DEATH. The Oil Rig SHAKES and the Water levels begin to DROP. Th Workers GASP for air.
The Oil Rig RISES from the OCEAN carried by Superman who slowly carries it to the nearby ICEBERG and places it dow as SOFTLY as possible.
The Workers SCREAM as the Oil Rig LANDS.
Superman BREATHS HEAVILY.
Why are you here? Orin stands behind him.
Leave them. They will destroy you if you don't. Superman faces the King.
It's their nature. The Workers start to flow out of the Oil Rig. Superman looks towards the Warships and walks past Orin.
You'd better hope we don't meet again. Superman LEAPS into the air and flies toward the Warship. Orin watches him as he departs.  11.
(respectful) We will brother. We will.
The CREW of the Warship, including Karpov and Uminski, ar on the deck. Superman lands on the Deck and MARCHES toward Karpov.
(angry) вЂ” There were 300 innocent people on that Rig!
(in Russian, terrified) Sorry! Sorry! Sorry Superman pauses.
(to Crew) Does anyone speak English? Uminski RAISES his hand.
Those people need help and medical attention. See that they get it. Uminksi nods and relays Superman's orders to the Crew.
(to Uminski) Who ordered the attack? Uminski doesn't say anything but LOOKS towards Karpov.
Is that so?
Karpov yells OBSCENITIES in Russian. He has been WRAPPED in the METAL REMAINS of the Warship's BRIDGE. His feet HA comically above the DECK.
Oksana and Lucya watch as Superman disappears into the heavens.
(in Russian) Superman.  12.

Superman flies HIGH above the Arctic PICKING UP SPEED as comes towards the PACIFIC OCEAN and skims at SUPER SONIC SPEED across the water. He SPINS as he gains ALTITUDE and enters the STRATOSPHERE BREAKING the SOUND BARRIER.
Superman SLOWS DOWN as he looks upon THE EARTH. He takes the sight for a moment before descending back towards the UNITED STATES. Floating in the distance is a LEXCORP SATELLITE.

A MAN sits cross legged on a desk in a DARK ROOM with his back to us. He is a BLACK SILHOUETTE against an array of COMPUTER SCREENS which are MONITORING the scene in the Arctic and showing BLURRED IMAGES of Superman flying through space. The screens go BLANK and the room goes BLACK.

Martha Kent walks toward the BARN. Her dog jumps is by he side. She opens the BARN DOORS and enters. She tries to PULL OP the TRAP DOOR when the Dog starts barking and she hears a familiar SWOOSHING sound.
(smiles) How come you always show up at dinner? Standing in the doorway is her son Superman... CLARK KENT
Good timing.

(sarcastic) Sure (tugs on the trap door) Well don't just stand there. Help me with this. Her Son smiles and PULLS the trap door open and they both walk down the steps into the DARK ROOM below. Martha switches on the LIGHT and REVEALS the room which i VERY DIFFERENT from when it used to conceal Clark's  13. SPACECRAFT. PASTED to the WALLS are HUNDREDS of NEWSPAPER CLIPPINGS o her son's EXPLOITS all around the world.
You've been busy.

I come down her a lot these days. I'm turning into your father. (smiles) When he wanted to be alone he'd come down here. It was his fortress of solitude. Clark sees an OLD FRAMED PHOTO of himself and his FATHER the workbench. He picks it up and stares at it LONGINGLY. It's clear he STILL misses him. Martha leans her head against his shoulder and looks at t photo.
He'd have been so proud of you Clark. He was proud of you.
I know. (puts the photo back down and looks around at all the clippings) If only the rest of the world shared his opinion.
They will. They just don't understand you right now. Or what happened with Zod. Clark's face HARDENS at the mention of Zod.
Look around you. Look at all the great things you've done and the people you've helped.
But you've only put up the good things they say about me.
Clark, honey. If I were to use the bad things they say I could cover the barn, the house and the outhouse.
We still have an outhouse?  14. They laugh. Martha HUGS Clark and lays her head against his TORN SYMB of HOPE.
Things will change. Someday the whole world will see you for what you are. Just like I do. And your Father did.
When you say it I believe it.
That's right. (loosens her grip and looks him in the eyes) Now let me fix you some dinner.
That's Ok Mom.
Oh can it. We do this every time. I already have a plate out.
(laughs) Ok. Ok. She lets him go and starts to MARCH up the steps.
And take off that damn beat up suit. No capes at the table.
Elvis wore a cape. You love Elvis.
Elvis was Elvis. He could wear anything. Clark smiles and follows his Mother.
Clark, dressed in a SHIRT and JEANS, is in the KITCHEN washing the dishes while Martha sits on the couch in the living room watching a TALK SHOW.

Hurry up Clark. Lois is on. Clark puts the final dish down and walks to the LIVING RO and leans against the door frame.  15. On the television TV talk show host CAT GRANT. A BUXOM BLONDE with an ICE WHITE smile hosts a DEBATE between LOI LANE and MORGAN EDGE, a SLICK YOUNG PR EXECUTIVE.
Cat SMILES at the CAMERA.
Good Evening. I'm Cat Grant and joining me tonight on our panel is Pulitzer Prize winning reporter for the Daily Planet Lois Lane.
Glad to be here Cat.
(impressed) She looks good on TV.
And to her left is Morgan Edge, PR executive to Metropolis' own LexCorp. The world's leading conglomerate and a virtual economy all by itself. Lovely to have you here.
Always a pleasure.

So Lois I'll start with you. It's been almost a year since the attack on Metropolis and in that time you have been a very vocal proponent in the media for the being known as Kal El as an ally to Earth.

I believe Kal El is being portrayed unfairly in the global media and as a witness to what transpired before and after the events in Metropolis I have no doubt in my mind that Kal El can and will aid humanity in ways that I understand the population are finding difficult to accept right now.
Morgan, you and LexCorp have a different view point.  16.
We share the same view as the majority of the world in that there is no evidence that this 'Superman' isn't a very real threat to the safety of every single human life on this planet.
I disagree. Just look at the good works he's done not just in the U.S but around the world in the last year.
By good works do you mean breaking international law and causing incident after incident. Cat, just tonight we are getting reports that he attacked Russian Military personnel in Russian waters.
Martha looks at Clark.
You were in Russia? How was it?
Angry.

(to Cat) The Russian President is furious. As long as we harbor Kal El it looks like we are condoning his actions. While he's flying around dishing out his own brand truth and justice the Russian government is accusing us of aiding terrorists. But Ms Lane would have you believe that he's a hero.
(to Cat) The United States government conceded that Kal El not only saved millions of lives here in Metropolis but also the entire planet.
Yet Ms Lane he couldn't save the 5,000 people that lost their lives right here in our city. A death (MORE )

EDGE (cont'd) toll that would have been much larger had it not been for the efforts of the city's police and emergency workers. And what part is Kal El playing in the reconstruction of the city? None. It is LexCorp that is fixing that damage that he ultimately caused.
(dismissive) This isn't a PR piece for LexCorp Morgan.
Just pointing out that your super friend isn't the only one doing good works.
(to Cat) Kal El possesses so much potential as an ally of humanity rather than being labeled an enemy. I believe he's here to help despite what people like Morgan would have you believe.

(scoffs) You say he's here to help but what has he done? Lex Luthor has poured over 5 billion dollars into the city's infrastructure. Giving many impoverished areas a new lease on life including rebuilding notorious slums like Hob's bay.
And which is still and enclave of violent criminal organizations which fall under the protection of LexCorp and their lawyers.
There is no evidence of that and you shouldn't concern yourself with slanderous rumors.
It isn't a rumor that you and Lex where members of the most notorious gangs ever to come out of Hob's Bay.  18.
It's no secret that life didn't afford Lex and I quite the opportunities that it did you Ms Lane.
(interjects) But look at Lex now.
Exactly Cat. Lex Luthor and LexCorp are the real heroes Metropolis needs. Not some reckless Alien who hides his true intentions from the world.
He does not like you.
(smiles) Seems like that.
Cat smiles at the camera.
Well that's all we have time for. After the break we will show you exclusive report from our Russian Affairs correspondent Angela Chen. Lois thank you for joining us.
Thank you.
And Morgan. Give my regards to Lex.
Sure thing.
I think she held her own.
She always does.
Why haven't you brought her around lately?  19.
Because you both get way too drunk.
(indignant ) Whatever. You gonna stay the night?
Sure. I got a doctors appointment in the morning anyway.
Ok well take out the garbage before you leave. Clark KISSES his Mother on the cheek.
Sure Mom.
Lois steps off the stage where Edge is having his MICROPH REMOVED.
Don't feel too bad Lane. TV is a lot different than sitting behind a laptop. This is where I shine.
If you ever get tired of being Luthor's mouthpiece then maybe you can pursue a career.
You know if you keep going after him like this Lex might start to take it personal. Lois looks Edge right in the eyes.
I couldn't prove the details of Luthor's (emphasises) "aggressive aquisitions' of rival companies. That doesn't mean I stopped looking.
That's usually when you should.
Usually my sources don't end up dead.  20.
Life can be a fragile thing Ms Lane. (smiles) Take care. Edge leaves.
(agitated) Self important asshole. She removes her CELL PHONE from her pocket and turns it o She has a TEXT FROM CLARK. TEXT: In Kansas. Sleeping over.
Of course.
Ms Lane. Louis looks up from her phone and sees JIMMY OLSEN, a 21 year old PHOTOGRAPHER from the DAILY PLANET. He's BRIGHT EYED, ENTHUSIASTIC and AWKWARD.
(nervous) Mr White sent me down here to meet you. She looks at him, CONFUSED.
I'm Jimmy. Jimmy Olsen the new photographer. A flash of RECOGNITION crosses Lois' eyes.
Right Jenny's brother. (starts to walk) I remember now. Jimmy follows her periodically SKIPPING to keep up with h STRIDE.
Why are you even here?

(awkwardly) Mr White sent me because you turned your phone off and I was to tell you not to say anything bad about Lex Luthor. Which I didn't because I left my damn I.D at home and they wouldn't let me past the lobby.  21. Lois smiles at him.
They had to call the Planet and by the time I got here you'd already said some stuff.
Next time then. AWKWARD silence.
So what now?
I'm going home.
I could drive you. My car's outside.
I can get home by myself.
I was just asking because it's late and all. For safety you know.
I don't need a bodyguard Jimmy. It's Metropolis, not Gotham.
GOTHAM CITY is a vast URBAN SPRAWL. SKYSCRAPERS cast SHAD over the DECREPIT SLUMS that SURROUND it's WEALTHY INNER HUB.

CARRIE, a 21 year old RED HEAD in THICK FRAMED GLASSES, walks ALONE down the DARK Gotham street. She's frustrated her PHONE is DEAD and it's beginning to RAIN. A CAB passes by. She raises her hand to hail it.
It DOESN'T stop.

Asshole! (she checks her phone again) Goddammit.  22. She HEARS something. A NOISE from up ahead. She pauses, SCANNING the area for any sign of DANGER. There's nothing Just SILENCE. After a moment she looks to her phone again. On it's scre she sees a FLASH of MOVEMENT. She looks up but before she can react she is SNATCHED by UNSEEN ASSAILANT.

TWO MEN in DIRTY ORANGE JUMPSUITS drag Carrie, who is KICKING and STRUGGLING, into the trash strewn ABANDONED THEATER which is lit by a SOLITARY LIGHT. In the Theater FIVE other MEN in identical jumpsuit huddle by that STAGE beneath a SIXTH MAN, with ROWS of NOTCHED CARVED into his EXPOSED TORSO, who sits atop a CHAIR on the STAGE like a KING on his THRONE. This is SERIAL MURDERER VICTOR ZSASZ these are his ACOLYTES. The five men part as Carrie is thrown roughly to the grou in front of the stage. Zsasz looks down on her with MADNE FILLED EYES. His Acolytes GRIN, GIGGLE and DROOL as their MASTER steps off the stage and approaches the young Gothamite.
(frightened/whispering) Please don't do this! Zsasz smiles. SALIVA drips down his chin as he kneels dow and leans in close. Close enough for her to RECOIL from h FOUL breath.
(with relish) You are whispering. My students didn't bring you here to whisper. Carrie's eyes BUG OUT when she sees the RAZOR SHARP DAGGE Zsasz produces and brings it up to her CHEEK.
No matter. You'll scream. (nicks her cheek) Soon enough. Carrie KICKS her LEGS at the AMUSED Serial Killer. She is RESTRAINED by the Acolytes.
(SCREAMS)

(smiles) Good. Good. (he licks the blood of the blade) That's a start. Acolyte#1 notices SOMETHING above him. He looks up but before he can make out what it is he is PULLED from the floor and DISAPPEARS into the DARKNESS above. Zsasz and his Acolytes FREEZE. WHAM! CRACK! -- Acolyte#1 wails in PAIN before being SLAM down into the ground HARD. He lays there UNCONSCIOUS and BLOODIED. A SHAPE descends from the DARKNESS above them. Acolytes #2 and #3 have no time to react. Acolyte#2's kne is BLOWN OUT as Acolyte#3's jaw is SHATTERED by a devastating blow. Both me CRUMBLE to the ground. Acolyte#4 SWINGS and IRON BAR at the SHADOWY FIGURE. He i DISARMED and the bar is SLAMMED into his STERNUM. He fall to the floor CLUTCHING his CHEST. Acolyte#5 tries to RUN but the bar IMPACTS him across his back SAVAGELY and he FALLS to the floor. The DARK FIGURE steps into the LIGHT. Carrie SCURRIES backward against the wall and sees the SYMBOL. BLACK against GREY... A BAT. Standing above the BEATEN and CRIPPLED bodies is GOTHAM'S GUARDIAN, THE DARK KNIGHT... THE BATMAN. His eyes NARROW as he focuses on his PREY, Zsasz. He step forward. Acolytes #6 and #7 pull their BLADES and ATTACK. #6's arm is SNAPPED like a TWIG. He tries to SCREAM but can't as his face is SMASHED into the CONCRETE FLOOR. #7 SWINGS WIDELY and the Batman effortlessly DODGES every attack with GRACE and SPEED. His reply is CRUSHING. Two BRUTAL STRIKES to the JAW and finished by a STOMACH CHURNING KICK to the GUT which send #7 down. HARD.
(shouts)
Zsasz holds Carrie CLOSE. His BLADE against her THROAT.  24.
(menacing) You move and I open her up! Batman stands motionless, SILENT. Zsasz smiles as he PRESSES the KNIFE against her SKIN. Li GLITTERS across the BLADE.
(whispers/to Batman) Please... A RAZOR SHARP BATARANG appears in Batman's hand.

help! Batman throws his weapon. His aim is accurate and it SLIC across the MEAT of Zsasz SHOULDER, CUTTING him DEEPLY. He SCREAMS. Taking the BLADE away from Carrie's neck. She ELBOWS him in the CHEST and STUMBLES FORWARD holding THROAT. Batman CATCHES her. Zsasz clutches his MUTILATED shoulder and flees the Theat Carrie looks into Batman's COLD, EMOTIONLESS eyes. Her ha slowly comes away from her throat. She's CUT. But superficially. He lets her go and FOLLOWS Zsasz out of the Theater. She stands SILENT. Watching him in AWE.

Zsasz runs toward a PARKED VAN. He opens the driver side door and gets inside. Sitting SLUMPED in the passenger SEAT is a DEAD MAN. His THROAT h been CUT. In the back of the Van are TWO MORE ACOLYTES. Each have MACHINE GUNS.
What happened?

(seething) The Bat. They exchange WORRIED glances.  25. Zsasz starts the engine and SLAMS his FOOT on the GAS. Th Van TEARS off down the street. Batman APPEARS and produces a GRAPPLING GUN from his UTIL BELT. He AIMS at the Van and FIRES. The Hook EMBEDS in the Van's REAR DOORS and Batman RETRAC the LINE and he is PULLED off his feet toward the Van. He lands on the back of the Van and FLIPS onto the roof.
Zsasz realizes that Batman is on the roof.
(shouts to Acolytes) He's on the roof! The Acolytes OPEN FIRE through the roof of the Van.
Bullets RIP through the Van's roof. Batman NARROWLY avoids the GUNFIRE. He PRESSES a BUTTON on his Utility Belt.
The ALLEYWAY is PITCH BLACK until the GROWL of A POWERFUL ENGINE is accompanied by the ILLUMINATION of TWO HEADLIGH
The Acolytes are RELOADING.

(angry) | Why won't he die! Batman SLAMS DOWN onto the HOOD and PLANTS a SMALL EXPLOS on the WINDSCREEN. It DETONATES and the screen SHATTERS. Batman GRABS Zsasz by the THROAT. The Acolytes FIRE on The Dark Knight. The Bullets TEAR through his CAPE. Batman releases Zsasz and RUNS up onto the roof as the Acolytes fire at him through the roof. Zsasz GRIPS his neck and looks in the SIDE MIRROR and see HEADLIGHTS in the distance behind him. Coming up FAST.  26.

Closing in the Van, ENGINE GROWLING, is an ARMORED BLACK CAR. The BATMOBILE. Batman JUMPS from the Van and LANDS on top of his Car as it's door SWINGS OPEN and he JUMPS inside. Zsasz Van picks up SPEED. The rear doors SWING OPEN and both Acolytes OPEN FIRE on Batmobile. Their bullets RICOCHET off the vehicles ARMORED EXTERIOR. Zsasz takes a SHARP corner. Acolyte#8 LOSES his BALANCE and FALLS from the Van. He SL into the asphalt and ROLLS limply down the street. The Batmobile SWERVES HARD to avoid running over the down Acolyte. Acolyte#9, unperturbed, continues to fire on the Batmobil Suddenly the Batmobile TURBO BOOSTS and OVERTAKES Zsasz's VAN.
Zsasz watches as the Batmobile passes him and VANISHES in the night. He eyes BULGE as ahead of him the Batmobile has come to a ABRUPT HALT. He SLAMS on the BREAKS.

Zsasz's Van HITS the armored Batmobile HARD and JACKKNIFE over it and CRASHES. The Van SKIDS along the TARMAC sending SPARKS flying befo coming to a halt. After a moment the Van door CREAKS open and Zsasz CRAWLS BLOODY and GROGGY. He stands, leans against the Van and steadies himself. WHAM! The sound of FIST against FLESH reverberates behind him. Zsasz turns. The Batman stands by the RUINED Van holding the UNCONSCIO Acolyte #9 by the THROAT. He releases his GRIP and the Acolyte FALLS to the ground.  27. The Dark Knight marches forward. His fists CLENCHED. Zsasz pulls his BLADE and ATTACKS. With LIGHTNING SPEED the Killer SLASHES and STABS at Batm The Dark Knight DODGES and PARRIES before GRABBING the Killer's FOREARM.
(calm) 2 Men. He BREAKS Zsasz's arm. The Killer SCREAMS.
(angry) 4 women. He PUNCHES Zsasz in the STOMACH sending him to his knees, COUGHING.
(angrier) 5 children. He CRACKS him across the JAW. Zsasz LAUGHS and SMILES through CRACKED, BLOODSTAINED TEE
(coughs) 6 children. Batman's eyes fill with HATE. He SNATCHES Zsasz's WINDPIPE and begins to SQUEEZE. In a FRENZY he starts to RAIN DOWN BLOWS.
His arm is GRABBED and YANKED back.

(firmly) That's enough! Batman SPINS around and finds himself FACE to FACE with a MAN, mid 20's, MASKED and DRESSED in BLACK with A DARK BL BIRD SYMBOL on his CHEST. This is DICK GRAYSON, FORMER ROBIN, now NIGHTWING.

(serious) He goes back in cuffs. Not a coffin.  28. Batman UNCLENCHES his FIST and looks down on Zsasz's BLOO and SWOLLEN face. Batman DROPS him. The Serial Killer still emits SOFT LAUGHTER through his BUSTED mouth. SIRENS can be heard. Batman PULLS his arm free of Nightwing's GRIP and marches toward the Batmobile. Nightwing watches him leave and DEPARTS before the G.C.P. arrive on the scene.

head_text.subj: EXT. ROOFTOP, TALL BUILDING, GOTHAM --. LATER

text: Batman stands on the rooftop looking out into Gotham. WAYNE TOWER can be seen in the distance.
This has to stop. Nightwing DROPS down onto the roof behind him and REMOVES his MASK. The FORMER ALLIES face each other.
(unrepentant ) It was less than he deserved.
(points his finger accusingly) You don't get to decide that. This is not what we do.
It's always what I've done.
(angered) Bullshit! What happened to the man who would think things through before beating someone to a pulp?
(emotionless) He was weak. Lacked conviction.
So you're just going to keep this up until what? You kill someone? Or yourself? Batman doesn't answer.  29.
We're not with you anymore. Not Gordon. Not Barbara. Sooner or later the law is going to come after you.
(turns to leave) I'll be ready for that.
(coldly) Or I will.
(cold) You do what you have to.
Maybe if you did what you had to Jason would still be here. Batman STOPS and SPINS around, ANGRY.
(shouts) You have no right!
(shouts back) I have every right.
(angry)
(shouts)
Batman has NO answer. Nightwing regains his COMPOSURE.

What you're doing won't change that. (turns to leave) Stop. Before it's too late. You don't belong out here anymore... Bruce. Nightwing leaves. Batman is left alone to ponder his FORMER friend's ACCUSATIONS. He walks to the edge of the rooftop and removes his COWL revealing the face of BRUCE WAYNE.  30. He's in his early 40's but doesn't look a day beyond 35. Except for his EYES which are OLD beyond his years. The e of of WAR VETERAN who has seen TOO MANY HORRORS. He looks at his BLOOD STAINED FISTS solemnly.

It's the EARLY HOURS of the morning. Clark, wearing his SUIT, steps out onto the PORCH carryin TWO TRASH BAGS. He walks towards the TRASH CANS. Martha, in a BATHROBE steps out onto the porch. She SHIVE in the cold. She pulls her robe tighter.
It's chilly. Clark smiles.
I'm sorry. I didn't mean to wake you.
Then don't stomp down the stairs in the A.M. I'd hoped you stay for breakfast.
I have to be back in Metropolis.
To see those quacks? I don't like them poking and prodding you.
(smiles as he puts the bags in the trash cans) They're friends Mom. No poking or prodding.
If you say so. (walks over and kisses him on the cheek) Take care. I'll see you soon.
Can't go to the party without you. I love you Mom.
I love you too.  31. She steps back as Superman TAKES off and disappears beyon the HORIZON.

THE THEMYSCIRIAN ROYAL SHIP slowly DOCKS in the METROPOLI MARINA. I0, a TALL, ATHLETHIC WOMAN in her 20's, stands on the DO A RAMP descends from the Boat to the Dock. At the top of the ramps stands a DEVASTATINGLY BEAUTIFUL WOMAN, 20's, whose LONG LOCKS of DARK HAIR BLOW in the FA BREEZE. This is DIANA of THEMYSCIRA, PRINCESS of the AMAZONS. Io KNEELS as Diana descends the ramp. 10 (in Amazonian) Princess Diana.
(in Amazonian) Stand Io. You do not have to bow to me. I am not my Mother. Io stands and Diana embraces her.
It has been too long. 10 I wish we could meet under better circumstances your Highness.
I know. Tell me Io. Tell me what has happened to Mala. Where is our sister?

An ELDERLY PRIESTESS stands over the SEMI CONSCIOUS body ORANA, an AMAZONIAN WARRIOR. Orana has been SEVERELY wounded and is CLINGING to life. Diana is led into the room by Io. The Priestess BOWS as Diana approaches Orana. The Princess CARESSES Orana's face.
(to Io) Who did this?  32. 10 Men came and stole our sisters away. Only Orana returned to us. Tortured and next to death. Diana kneels beside Orana.
Orana. Orana's eyes struggle to focus.
Diana?
I am here sister. You must tell me who did this?
(weak) They kept us in a tomb filled with horrors. (takes a labored breath) Their King kept us prisoner. Orana passes out.

Rest sister. (stands and turns to Io) Who is this King? 10 The one who rules this place. The city bears his mark. We should never have come here. Its a world ruled by animals. Diana looks at her fallen fellow Amazonian.

We are here because your Queen commands it. We need to find where our sisters are being held. 10 There is one who will give us the location. Io gestures to the Doorway where Morgan Edge stands, GRINNING.
(cocky) I may not understand the lingo but I figure you might be wondering where the other lady is being kept.  33.
(in English) And you would tell us?
Sure. For the right price.
I won't barter for life of one of my sisters.

Then your sister won't have life much longer. Suddenly A GOLDEN LASSO is WHIPPED around Edge's neck and is PULLED to his knees. The Lasso begins to GLOW with GOLDEN ELECTRICITY. Edge's EYES begin to GLOW
Is my sister alive?
(hypnotic) Yes.
Where do they keep her?
Lexcorp Research and development. Three miles south outside the city limits. Diana REMOVES the Lasso. Edge holds his neck.
(confused) What did you do to me?
I let you live. (to Io) Get this beast out of my sight. Io picks Edge from the floor and escorts him, ROUGHLY, ou Diana GRIPS the Lasso TIGHT with BOTH HANDS.
S.T.A.R LABS is a HUGE CIRCULAR BUILDING located near the METROPOLIS HARBOR.  34.

The MAIN LABORATORY is a VAST room littered with COMPUTER MONITORS and SCIENCE EQUIPMENT beneath a GIANT SKYLIGHT. SUNLIGHT fills the room. HEAD SCIENTIST PROFESSOR SILAS STONE, 50's, is compiling DATA on his TABLET. T.O MORROW, a SCIENTIST in his 50's sits at his computer screen monitoring SATELLITE FEEDS. He notices something o his screen.
(to Silas) He's here.
Good. Open the skylight. Morrow presses a few keys on his computer and the GLASS R opens up.
He's late. Silas turns and smiles at COLONEL JOHN STEWART. A TALL, BROAD SHOULDERED FORMER MARINE. His UNIFORM is EMBLAZONED with a S.T.A.R Labs logo on his SHOULDER.
You need to tell him to keep to the schedule if we don't want the higher ups to find out about our arrangement.
I'm sure he has his reasons.
I'm sure we'll hear about it on the news. HOVERING just above the Skylight is Superman. He floats d into the middle of the room.
(to Silas) Professor Stone. (to Stewart) John.
Kal. Silas notices the DAMAGED suit.
Long night?  35.
Long year.
(annoyed) You where scheduled over an hour ago.
(apologetic) Sorry. I had dinner with my Mom. Silas smiles. Stewart RAISES an EYEBROW.
Follow me. Superman follows Silas through the Laboratory and towards RESEARCH CENTER. Morrow walks over to Stewart and hands him a Tablet.
Take a look at this. Stewart looks it over. It's a NEWS ARTICLE. IT READS: SUPERMAN ATTACKS RUSSIAN TROOPS.
(weary) Swell
Superman is SHIRTLESS and laying on a TABLE. Attached to his CHEST are ELECTRODES which send INFORMATI to Silas' MONITOR.
(in awe) ) It's amazing.
What is?
Kryptonian physiology. So different yet so similar to our own. I can never get used to it.
(smiles) Took me 30 years.  36.

Your vitals are perfect. Heart rate, blood pressure, brain activity. All perfect. Yet still you haven't tapped your full potential. (turns off the monitor) There is so much we can learn from you. So much that could benefit us.
Not everybody shares that enthusiasm.
Not everybody has vision Kal or can see past their fears. Which is understandable. Once the gods were above us and now they walk among us. It's a frightening concept for most.
The ones who are attacking the oil rigs. They're not like me but they're not like you either. Something else entirely. I know it's hard to believe.
I believe you. Silas sits down beside the Man of Steel.
Not everything remarkable on this Earth comes from elsewhere.
What do you mean?
That we are at a dawning of a new age. An age of Gods and Monsters.
You're not frightened.
Not when you stand for us. Silas stands and puts his hand on Superman shoulder. Superman puts his hand on his.
Come on. I have something to show you.  37.
Superman follows Silas to through the RED ROOM. A TOP SEC section of S.T.A.R Labs that houses varying kinds of EXPERIMENTAL TECHNOLOGY.
What is this place?
This is the Red Room. It's where we keep our advancements that for whatever reason the greater public isn't quit ready for yet. They come to a LARGE CONTAINMENT CAPSULE.
Here it is. Silas inputs a code into the KEYPAD on it's side. It open with a HISS. Inside is a BLUE BODY SUIT.
It's a prototype for a new space suit. Highly durable yet very flexible. We'll have to make a few changes but I'd like you to have it.
I can't accept this. You've already taken too many risks.
You have to. (gestures to the tears in Superman's suit) We can't have the savior of the world in rags.
(concedes) Thank you Silas.
We'll have it finished before I leave for Washington. I do wish you'd come with me. Speaking to the President would help your cause.
I want to address the Leaders of the World as a whole before I speak to them individually.  They walk 38.
I understand. (He closes the Capsule) The Conference. Do you think you're ready?
I think so. It's been a year. At this point they will have to accept me.
Still hopeful I see. And if they don't?
Well that's up to them. I'll continue trying to help regardless. Will you be there?
Of course. I was hoping to bring my son but he has other things on his mind.
The big game?
Every game is a big game to Victor. I suppose it has to be when your a quarterback. towards the exit.
I'd imagine you'd have made quite the player yourself.
My Mother wouldn't let me.
Afraid you'd hurt someone?
She was afraid they'd hurt me.
(laughs) I don't think there's anything out there that can hurt you.
PROJECT CADMUS is a large UNDERGROUND LABORATORY.

SASHA FEDEROV, a CHECHNYAN SCIENTIST, stands in front of a giant INCUBATION CHAMBER which is a REVERSE  39. ENGINEERED KRYPTONIAN GENESIS CHAMBER. He looks on the CONTENTS of the Chamber with a mix of PRI and AWE. FLOATING in the Chamber is a HUMANOID FORM which is COVER in GREY MUSCLE TISSUE and SINEWS.
LEXCORP PLAZA is a TALL OFFICE BUILDING in DOWNTOWN METROPOLIS. The MARBLE SIGN in it's COURTYARD READS: 'LEXCORP PLAZA.
(angry) . Are you out of your damn mind?

location: PERRY WHITE'S OFFICE, DAILY PLANETS OFFICES, LEXCORP

text: PERRY WHITE, the EDITOR IN CHIEF, SLAMS a STACK of PAPERS down on his desk. He's PISSED. Lois stands in front of him, DEFIANT.
You go after Lex Luthor on national television? What the hell were you thinking?
(unrepentant ) It was a debate. I was defending my position.
By slandering Metropolis' favorite son? How do expect to rally support from the public when you're trying to crucify Metropolis' favorite son?
Morgan Edge has been taking every opportunity to turn what happened into a PR stunt for Lexcorp. All on the basis that Kal is a threat to the world.
And he isn't?
You know he isn't.  40.
I know what he did for us. I also know what happened despite that. People are still scared and if you want to change that pursuing old grudges isn't the way to do it.
It's not about that.
It's been about that for the last 5 years Louis. Let it go.
My investigation got a man killed. Would you let it go?

(sighs) You can't touch him Lois. Nobody can. (he turns and stares out the window in deep thought ) I grew up in Hob's Bay Louis. I know the type of person that survives a place like that. what that person is capable of. (turns back to Lois) Luthor runs the show. It's not by chance were in a building he owns. At anytime he could buy the Planet right out from under us. You keep this up and he will bury us. You can't fight this battle on two fronts. Lois weighs Perry's comments.
(reluctant ) I'll back off. For now.
(firmly) For good. (takes his seat) I want you to cover the Conference.
I told you I won't.
It's non negotiable Lois. It's the largest gathering of world leaders this city has ever seen. And they are here to see Superman. You have to be there.  41.
This isn't fair Perry.

location: BULLPEN, DAILY PLANET OFFICES, LUTHOR PLAZA --

text: Clark, wearing his GLASSES, sits at his desk eaves droppi on Perry and Lois' conversation with his SUPER HEARING. Jimmy sits on the desk beside him eating a bowl of nachos Jimmy is talking but Clark isn't paying attention.
Clark? Clark realizes that Jimmy has asked him a question.
Sorry Jimmy I zoned out there for a second. What was that?
I asked have you seen him up close?
who?
Who do you think? Superman. I been talking about him for the last 5 minutes. Honestly buddy you need to get your hearing checked.
No. I didn't start working until after the whole thing.

Damn. I want to see him in action. You know last month he stopped a cruise liner from sinking. Clark turns his attention back to Perry's office where he can see Lois and Perry's ARGUMENT getting very HEATED.
(disinterested) Sounds neat. Lois STORMS out of Perry's office, SLAMMING the door behi her. EVERYONE in the bullpen STOPS and STARES.
Lois?
(angry) | Not now Smallville!  42. Clark stands, grabs his coat and CHASES after Lois. He clumsily BUMPS into people as he does.
(awkward) Sorry! Sorry!
Clark catches up with Lois as she exits the Plaza doors.
(concerned) Hold on. Whats wrong? Lois stops.
Don't pretend that you didn't hear everything.
I thought it would be more polite to ask.
This is such a bad idea. Someone else needs to cover that Conference.
It's not like you to be afraid of a few world leaders.
I don't need to watch you get crucified by a bunch of scared bureaucrats. Are you sure about this?
No. (smiles) But I have to try. She HUGS him tight laying her head on his chest. He WRAPS his arms around her.
We'll figure this out.
I know. (smiles) ) Fly me to Cancun?
(laughs) Sure.  43. They link arms and stroll down the BUSY street past BILLBOARDS that ADVERTISE LexCorp's latest COMPUTER SOFTW
My Mother's coming into town.
(genuine) Really?.
That's not an excuse to get liquored up.
Your Mother's a bad influence.
You influence each other. They laugh.
I want to take her to the Spire opening.
I don't know why you even want to go to Luthor's Ball.
Mom's a country girl she's never been to a high society event. She'd love it. Plus it's an excuse to wear a suit.
Clark Kent in a suit? I can't imagine it. He smiles before his ATTENTION is drawn to a CROWD of PEO that are GATHERED near a WALL. He stops. Lois looks CONCERNED.

(solemn) Clark don't. Clark gives her a PAINED look and walks toward the crowd. He makes his way through and sees the wall is COVERED by HUNDREDS of PHOTOS and KEEPSAKES. It's a MEMORIAL to the LIVES LOST a year before. Clark SCANS the wall. He sees MEN... WOMEN... CHILDREN... FATHERS... MOTHERS... SONS... DAUGHTERS.
The TURMOIL is evident on Clark's face. Lois TOUCHES his arm gently.
Clark?
(overwhelmed) There's so many.
(softly) I know. Come on. Clark takes one last LOOK over his shoulder as Lois LEADS him away.

The PRESIDENT OF THE UNITED STATES DIANE NELSON, a tall, slender woman in her 50's, sits behind desk. Her SERIOUS eyes drifting back and forth between the three people sitting in front of her. GENERAL SWANWICK, Head of the UNITED STATES NORTHERN COMMAND, sits to her right along with Silas Stone and to left is... AMANDA WALLER, a STERN and FOCUSED SENATOR with an INTIMIDATING PRESENCE.
So what are our options?
Honestly very few. The world is watching our every move on the Superman. We have to take a definitive action.
Which is?
(forthright) Engagement.
I must advice against this course of action. Superman has in my opinion more than proved himself as an ally.
(to Swanwick) He's proved himself as a liability. (MORE )
WALLER (cont'd) (to President) Russia is pushing for some sort of action and if we don't act now we risk looking weak.
What do you suggest? She hands her a THICK FILE stamped: CADMUS The President FLIPS through it.
What am I looking at here?

Last year we recovered several items from Metropolis after the attack. Two items in particular. An advanced incubation system and a body. Which Cadmus Cadmus has managed to successfully duplicate the Alien D.N.A The President looks INTRIGUED. Swanwick looks SURPRISED.
Which means?
Which means Ma'am why worry about a Superman when we can have our own.
(to Waller) You and I both know the results of Cadmus are inconclusive at best.
(dismissive) I have assurances from the head of the project Professor Sasha Federov the worlds foremost authority on genetic engineering that a subject is ready for field testing.
Does S.T.A.R Labs have any alternatives?
We are researching several courses of action. None of which involve weaponizing alien technology.  46.

(to Swanwick) Courses of action that are leading to nothing. (to President) Mrs President the world is changing. I and I'm sure S.T.A.R Labs have been monitoring several occurrences all over the world. The attacks on oil platforms by terrorists whose technology is something we have never encountered before. Reports of an entity in Central City that moves faster than sound. Cadmus can counter these very real threats. All we need is your signature. The President PONDERS her decision as she reads the file.
Why am I only hearing about this now?
Up until a few months ago there was nothing to tell. Just research, experimentation, no concrete results.
Who's. funding this project?
Several different institutions.
I must advice against this Mrs President.

(to Swanwick) I had the Russian President on the phone for over three hours this morning General Swanwick. We need solution and I believe Ms Waller has provided us with one Waller smiles SELF SATISFIED.
I can't give you a definitive answer until after the conference. but as of now... (places the file on her desk) You have my support.  47.
Thank you Mrs President.
Stewart stands outside the Oval Office doors. The doors open. Waller leaves the Office followed by Swanwick and Stone.
_ (angry) This is unacceptable Amanda.
I'm just doing what you would in my position. (turns to Silas and smiles) Don't presume to think that I'm unaware of the Alien's relationship with S.T.A.R Labs Professor Stone.
Cadmus is a mistake.

Cadmus will make sure that Superman will think long and hard before acting against our interests. The game has changed. There's a living weapon patrolling our skies and it's about time we had our own. (turns away and walks down the hallway) This is an arms race and I intend to win. Swanwick is FRUSTRATED.
(to Swanwick) Who's your new girlfriend?
Amanda Waller.
So that's the 'Wall'?
Who's funding Cadmus?
I have no idea Silas.  48.

Stone and Stewart leave the White House grounds and walk towards a waiting CAR and DRIVER. Standing by the Car is a Silas' Son VICTOR STONE. A STAR QUARTERBACK. He wears a METROPOLIS UNIVERSITY JACKET.
(concerned) We need a strategy Silas.
I know John. I didn't see this coming. Cadmus is off the books.
Black Ops?
No. It's privately funded. And that's whats worrying me.
The only person with that the resources is...
A big problem John. Victor opens the back passenger seat for his Father.
(to Victor) How's the arm Vic?
Like a cannon.
Better be I got money on you.
Then you'll be buying the drinks after man.
Come on Victor. Victor gets in beside his Father and closes the door.
(to Stewart) I'll see you in Metropolis. The Car pulls off.  49.

location: LEXCORP ADVANCED RESEARCH AND DEVELOPMENT CENTER,

text: A LEXCORP HELICOPTER LANDS on the HELIPAD atop the SPRAWL LEXCORP RESEARCH AND DEVELOPMENT COMPLEX located just outside the CITY LIMITS. The Complex is HEAVILY GUARDED by ARMED LEXCORP SECURITY GUARDS who stand at each CORNER of the Helipad. MERCY GRAVES, late 20's, a STRIKING WOMAN in a BUSINESS SUIT. steps out onto the Building where she is greeted by BRUNO, the HEAD of SECURITY, who is FLANKED by TWO SUITED SECURITY GUARDS.
(faux politeness) It's always good to see you Mercy.
(smiles) A pleasant lie Bruno, but a lie nonetheless. BRUNO. Well I tried.
And like everything in your life you'll have to try a little harder.
So why are you slumming it with the grunts?
I'm overseeing the disposal of the material.

I see. Well better you than me. Don't wait on around on my account. He gestures toward the HELPIPAD ENTRANCE. Mercy enters the the Complex. Bruno and the Suited Guards follow. A HOODED and CLOAKED FIGURE DASHES at AMAZING SPEED throu the GROUNDS and JUMPS HIGH through the air and lands ON T of the COMPLEX in the MIDDLE of the Helipad. Before the Guards have time to REACT the Figure STRIKES, DISARMS and INCAPACITATES them. The Figure REMOVES her hood to REVEAL Diana in a SLEEK BO SUIT as the WONDER WOMAN.  50.

location: HALLWAY, LEXCORP RESEARCH AND DEVELOPMENT CENTER --

text: Mercy, Bruno and the Guards walk down the STERILE WHITE HALLWAY followed by the Security Detail. SUDDENLY the LASSO is WRAPPED around Bruno's NECK and he DRAGGED backwards OFF HIS FEET. Mercy turns to see Bruno SMASH VIOLENTLY into the WALL at the end of the Hallway. Wonder Woman TAKES OUT the Security with TwO SWIFT KICKS. They SLAM into the walls and to the FLOOR UNCONSCIOUS.

_ (angry) . You just made the last mistake of your life. Mercy PULLS a GUN which Wonder Woman WHIPS out of her han Like LIGHTNING Mercy ATTACKS the Amazon with a series of PUNCHES and KICKS which are all BLOCKED. Wonder Woman COUNTERS with a KICK to Mercy's GUT which se her backwards. Mercy, DEFEATED, tries to RUN but CLUTCHES at her THROAT the Lasso WHIPS around her neck. It GLOWS.
(menacing) You hold one of my people prisoner.
(hypnotic) Yes.
Take me to her.

location: SUB BASEMENT, LEXCORP RESEARCH AND DEVELOPMENT CENTE

text: Mercy, still under the Lasso's THRALL, stands with Wonder Woman outside the GLASS DOORS of a LABORATORY deep beneat the Research Center.

Open it. Mercy places her hand on a SCANNER beside the door. It RECOGNIZES her PALM PRINT and the doors SLIDE OPEN. Wonder Woman PUSHES Mercy inside. Inside the room is a LIQUID FILLED TANK where MALA, late 20's, FLOATS UNCONSCIOUS.  51. A SCIENTIST, 40's, STANDS SHOCKED as he watches Wonder Wo DRAG Mercy towards the Tank.
(to Scientist) Release her!
(frightened) I can't! The Amazon WHIPS the Lasso from Mercy who falls to her kn and around the Scientist's NECK.
(hypnotic) I can! The Scientist operates the Tank and the liquid is DRAINED from it. The Tank OPENS and Wonder Woman RUSHES to CATCH Mala befo she FALLS to the floor.
Mala! Mala's eyes SLOWLY OPEN.
(in Amazonian, groggy, confused) Diana?
(in Amazonian) I've come to take you home. She LIFTS Mala of her feet CARRYING her out of the Laboratory. After she leaves Mercy, holding her throat, turns to the cowering Scientist.
(horse) Why are you standing there. Sound the alarm!

The ALARMS are RINGING throughout the Complex. CRASH!!! -- the ENTRANCE DOORS SHATTER as TWO SECURITY GUARDS are TOSSED through them. Wonder Woman EMERGES from the Entrance CARRYING Mala in h ARMS.  52. She RUNS at INCREDIBLE SPEED away from the Complex as GUA on the Roof OPEN FIRE on her. When she comes to the PERIMETER FENCE she JUMPS over it, CLEARING it by 40 FEET. She LANDS and VANISHES into the NIGHT. Mercy appears on the Roof, SEETHING as she RUBS her neck.
Wonder Woman lays Mala down a RIVER.
Rest Sister. You're safe now.
(frail) He wants to kill him. He hates him so much.
Who? Who are you talking about?
He wants to kill their New God. He wants to kill the Superman!
Wayne Manor is a HUGE 19th CENTURY ERA MANSION.

ALFRED, 70's, is an ELDERLY but still very SPRY BRITISH BUTLER walks down the hallway towards Bruce Wayne's STUDY carrying a tray of food. Inside he approaches an ANCIENT GRANDFATHER CLOCK and TURNS the hands to 10:48 then -- CL -- the clock UNLOCKS and PULLS AWAY from the wall reveali a HIDDEN DOORWAY. He enters. The Clock RETURNS to it's original position behind him.

Alfred walks down a STONE STAIRCASE illuminated by a seri of LIGHTS on the ROCK CEILING above. BATS SCREECH past ov head as he descends further down into the VAST CAVERN. THE BATCAVE is huge. Housed inside the vast EXPANSE is an array of HI-TECH GADGETS and WEAPONRY. Old now, showing signs of WEAR and TEAR after YEARS of use. Alfred passes the parked Batmobile. In the back of the Cave sitting atop a LANDING PAD is the BATWING. A JET which is covered in DIRT and DUST from yea of IDLENESS.  53. Alfred makes his way up a set of steps to an ELEVATED PLATFORM where Bruce Wayne sits in front of THREE LARGE COMPUTER MONITORS. Each screen tells a different news sto RIGHT SCREEN: SERIAL KILLER VICTOR ZSASZ APPREHENDED. MIDDLE SCREEN: SUPERMAN ATTACKS RUSSIAN TROOPS.
Bruce is FOCUSED on the MIDDLE SCREEN. Alfred puts the tray on the desk beside the computer screens.

I brought you some dinner Master Bruce. One must never obsess on an empty stomach. Bruce glances at the food but doesn't reply. Alfred looks at the images on screen and sees Superman HOVERING above Metropolis in SHAKY AMATEUR FOOTAGE.
If the criminals of Gotham are lacking your interest might I suggest turning your attention to Central City's rogues before tackling an alien. Wayne still doesn't reply.
(weary) Try and eat something. He turns to leave.
I saw Grayson. Alfred STOPS when he hears the NAME.
He's turned his back on me. They all have.
(honestly) He's turned his back on the part of you that reminds him of what we've lost.
He hates me.  54.
It's not hate Master Bruce it's hurt. He mourns the brother and blames the father.
And who do you blame?

I blame the one who took him. Not the one who loved him. (Alfred puts his hand on Bruce's shoulder) But I do regret the loss of a man who sought diplomacy over violence. I miss that man. (beat ) Everything's ready for your visit to Metropolis He SQUEEZES Bruce's shoulder before leaving. Bruce is still for a moment before standing and walking o to a LARGE GLASS DISPLAY CASE. Inside the case is a DARK RED and BLACK TACTICAL ARMOR (CHEST PIECE, GLOVES, BOOTS) which stands beneath a DARK GREEN HOODED CLOAK and a BLACK FACE MASK. Bruce places his hand on the glass and stands for a momen His WEARY eyes filled with the HURT of a FATHER who has l a SON.

The HALLWAY is DARK. ELEVATOR DOORS open ILLUMINATING the Hallway. Amanda Waller steps out and walks down the Hallway toward two HUGE REINFORCED DOORS. Her footsteps ECHO as she does When she arrives at the door she faces A CONTROL PANEL. S SPEAKS into it.

(into control panel) Waller, Amanda. Clearance MOS 17 The Reinforced Doors OPEN UP slowly revealing the CLONING FACILITY. Waller steps inside and the doors close behind her. Federov, SURPRISED, rushes toward her.
Mrs. Waller. I wasn't aware you'd scheduled a visit.  55.
I didn't. I'm here in an unofficial capacity. I wanted to get a closer look at what we're making here. Federov nods, SHEEPISHLY. Waller walks toward the Incubation Chamber.
When will it be ready?
On schedule.
This project is a big risk Federov. I can't afford any mistakes.
I promise you our subject will be perfect. It's my finest work.
Show me. Federov presses a few BUTTONS on the Chamber's CONTROL PA and the screen RAISES revealing its CONTENTS. Waller is visibly UNIMPRESSED by the Creature.
It doesn't look like much to me Federov.
Relatively speaking neither does Superman but then again you're not here for aesthetic.
I'm here for results which this...
(with pride) Ultimate.
Ultimate can provide.
Trust me. You won't be disappointed. The Ultimate is superior to the Superman in every way.  56.
It had better be if and when the Alien goes rogue. (leans in close to look at the Creature) I've seen enough. Federov closes the Chamber.
General Swanwick has been demanding access to the Project.
Swanwick is a fool. A decrepit relic that can't see beyond the barrel of his gun. He thinks. he has his weapon and doesn't want anyone else to have theirs.
He does have authority.
The only authority here is me Federov. I'll deal with Swanwick you focus on getting your Ultimate operational. She starts to walk towards the doors.
So what to I tell him?
Only what you're allowed to.
Which is?
Nothing.

A M.C.P.D PATROL CAR is parked outside of LEXCORP TOWER, HUGE SKYSCRAPER. Sitting in the Car is OFFICER JAMES HARPER, a BROAD SHOULDERED COP in his 40's. The passenger door opens and partner GUY GARDNER, an ATHLETIC MAN in his late 20's. He has COFFEE CUPS and DONUTS.
That's a strong black coffee for me and... (hands Harper his cup) And a decaf green tea for Grandma.  57. Harper takes the cup.
Witty.
Donut?
No thanks. I brought a salad. Harper opens up a CONTAINER full of LEAFY GREENS and GRIL CHICKEN.
Suit yourself. VAN passes them. Harper looks at it with DISDAIN.
Would you look at that. He's everywhere.
(eating his donut) who?
Who do you think? Luthor. He's got his damn trucks and billboards everywhere.
It's always been like that Jim. Far as I remember.

Not always Guy. It just sticks in my throat how a little punk like that can end up with everything. I must have busted him and his cronies a dozen times. Never could get anything to stick. Bastard was always to smart for us.
He's put a lot of money into Metropolis.
Considering how much he's taken out of it it's only right. You want to know how he came by all that cash?
Sure I could use a few pointers.  58.

When he was just some brat on the street him and his punks ran a protection racket down in the Bay. Bed good folks dry. He takes that cash and uses it to make a computer program then sells it to big firm out west for a billion. Gardner WHISTLES at the number.
It gets better. He then uses that cash and makes a better program makes the one he made first look like a calculator. Turns that billion into billions.
Sounds like good business.
That's not the point. Point is he got his start by taking out of the pockets of decent people. Guys a crook and the whole damn world loves him.
He's rebuilding th city after those aliens blasted it.
He's still a crook. Just a rich crook.
I'll take him over Superman any day. Better the devil you know Jim.
You been watching the box? He's been doing a lot of good out there in the world.
That'd be fine by me if he stayed away from Metropolis. I don't like that space man flying around here. Aliens weirds me out. A BLACK LIMO pulls up outside the LexCorp buildings MAIN ENTRANCE.
Who's this now? Alfred steps out of the Limo and opens the Limo passenger door and Bruce Wayne emerges dressed in a EXPENSIVE SUIT.  59.
(surprised) That's Bruce Wayne.
unimpressed who? 07 Alfred gets back into the Limo while Wayne walks enters LexCorp tower.

Wayne walks through the Lobby and stops when he notices there is a BASKETBALL COURT located to his right. HIP YOU TECHNICIANS and COMPUTER PROGRAMMERS WALK back and forth. Mercy awaits the Billionaire Gothamite. She has a SCARF around her neck to CONCEAL her BRUISES. She reaches out her hand to Wayne.
(perky) . Mercy Graves. Assistant to Mr. Luthor. It's a pleasure. Wayne takes her hand and cracks a smile.
The pleasure is all mine. (points to the court) Nice decor.
(smiles) A perk for the minions. Lex believes a entertained workforce is a productive workforce.
Nice policy.

Effective policy. She leads Wayne towards the GLASS ELEVATOR BANKS. They st inside and Mercy presses the TOP FLOOR. The Elevator lifts off. As the lift climbs Wayne observes each floor. Many of the Floors are filled with ROWS and ROWS of COMPU MONITORS each manned by a YOUTHFUL TECH GENIUS.
I remember when LexCorp was a warehouse by the Bay.  60.

Lex's goal has always been meeting ones potential. He believes LexCorp is an example to which everyone can strive to. The Elevator comes to a halt and the doors slide open and Wayne steps into the SPACIOUS 125th floor PENTHOUSE. The ROOM is HUGE and ROUND bordered BY WINDOWS which offe PANORAMIC view of Metropolis. A BALCONY jutts out of the side of the Penthouse. Wayne steps inside and the doors close behind him. Sitting CROSS LEGGED on his desk in front of an ARRAY of COMPUTER SCREENS is the RICHEST man on the PLANET, ALEXAN "LEX' LUTHOR, 30, the C.E.0 of LexCorp. He is one part TE GENIUS, one part RUTHLESS business man and two parts METROPOLIS STREET TOUGH. His SHAGGY MANE of HAIR hangs be his eyes and a detailed SLEEVE TATTOO of the METROPOLIS SKYLINE creeps up his right arm. His EYES say it all. Behind them BURN the FIRES of UNPARALLELLED GENIUS. A POWERFUL INTELLECT enabling him t accomplish anything he bends his will toward. Within the boundaries of his mind he is GODLIKE. Wayne observes the IMAGES that captivate the youthful billionaire... THE MAN OF STEEL.
Look at it. So sleek. So powerful.
He's an impressive specimen.
'It' Wayne (shifts around to face him) It's an alien. And a trespasser and it doesn't belong on this planet. Perhaps you share my view?
Superman isn't the reason for my being in Metropolis.
Your reason being Metropolis itself.
I can't help but take an interest in the city's tragic circumstances.  61.
(half smiles) And profitable circumstances.
Neither of us would have gotten to where we are if we didn't look at the bottom line.

I got to where I am through hard work and innovation. You by accident of birth. I assure you we view our bottom lines very differently. He HOPS of his desk and walks past Wayne to a BAR near th ELEVATOR. In comparison Luthor is much SMALLER that the POWERFULLY BUILT Gothamite. Yet his CONFIDENCE more than matches Wayne's stature. Luthor reaches into the FRIDGE and removes and ENERGY DRI
(cracks open the can) I'd offer you a drink but I don't have any gingerale.
We both want the same thing Lex. To help Metropolis. Our past differences shouldn't get in the way of that.
(takes a gulp) Past differences? As I recall you called me an amoral, arrogant brat.
Yes on the very same day you launched your first satellite. Luthor smiles.
And a cyber attack crippled mine.
(smirks and leans back against the Bar) Coincidence Wayne. The world is full of it.
Apparently so. Took us quite a while to get it operational again.  62.
I liked that satellite. It was quaint. Whatever happened to it?
An alien in a black onesie kicked it out of the sky.
(amused) Ouch.
I'm here to help. The rebuilding of Metropolis is my main priority. Pooling our resources would better serve it's citizens. I'm willing to let bygones be bygones. If you are?

An alien spacecraft blasted a hole in the city where I was born. I'm not about to let a few limp insults from a trust fund baby overshadow that. (finishes his drink and crushes the can) Do you really think you would have gotten past the lobby if I was holding a grudge.
I'm glad we can put it aside. I don't think either of us relishes continuing this war for contracts.

(dismissive) Wayne enterprises is a powerful company but not enough to challenge me in my own backyard. I am LexCorp. LexCorp is Metropolis. Those contracts are mine. But despite your company's limitations there are things I can use it for. It'll allow me to focus on more important matters. Wayne looks back at the monitors.
Superman?
(irritated) It's not a man. It's an alien. And by the time the world finally absorbs that this... (MORE )

LUTHOR (cont'd) (gestures out of the window towards the ruined sections of Metropolis) . could happen again. Wayne look out on the RUINED and IN REPAIR structures. Hi face reflects his CONCERN for the City.
What would you suggest?
When a dog bites a man we put it down. Because we understand what it's capable of. That thing isn't one of us and doesn't deserve the understanding that the government is affording it.
You sound like you want to kill him?
There comes a time when even a god must die.
You've seen what he... 'It' can do. All that power. All that strength.

It might be hard for someone like you born with the silveriest of spoons to understand. I spent my childhood on the streets. I joined a gang. It's survival. I didn't have much of a choice. I learned there that there was always someone bigger, stronger but never smarter. By the time I was 15 that gang answered to me. Strength is nothing Wayne. Resolve is everything.
Then why not use that resolve to find a peaceful solution.
There is no peaceful solution with an trespasser.
How about one that doesn't involve you going toe to toe with a god.  64.
(amused) Toe to toe? I don't go toe to toe with anybody. You don't become the general by charging the frontlines with the rest of the troops.
Too smart for that? Luthor raises and eyebrow and smiles.
I'm glad you reconsidered and alliance.

I'm not usually one to second guess myself but you don't become a billionaire at 18 by ignoring the bigger picture. (walks past Wayne and returns to his position on the desk) I'll have Mercy send some contracts over. I'm sure we can find something for you to do. However minimal.

I look forward to it. I'll be at my Metropolis offices. Luthor doesn't reply. He just stares at the Computer screens and the BLUE and RED clad source of his VENDETTA. Wayne turns and walks toward the Elevator.
6'2". 225lbs Wayne steps into the Elevator.
You got me exactly.
(smiles) I was talking about the Batman. Wayne pauses as the Elevator doors slide shut. Luthor smiles. Assured in his SUPERIORITY.
Superman, in his NEW SUIT now with FLOWING RED CAPE and H SYMBOL on it's chest, HOVERS SERENELY among the CLOUDS wi his eyes CLOSED as he LISTENS to the SOUNDS of the City.  65.
(uncertain) I can't be certain... (polite) Two sugars please... (affectionate) You're beautiful...
Frightened PATRONS lie FACE DOWN on the floor of the Bank while TwO MASKED and ARMED BANK ROBBERS stand guard while THIRD proceeds to INTIMIDATE the BANK MANAGER by JAMMING GUN in his FACE.
(hands two large rucksacks to Bank Manager ) Money in the bags. 50's and 100's (shouts) Now!
(calmly) Ok. Just stay calm. We'll do anything you want. The Bank Manager hands the rucksacks to a YOUNG FEMALE BA TELLER who proceeds to comply with the Bank Robber's demands.
(to Bank Robber#3) Hurry it up!
(turns his head away from the Manager) I'm on it! With the Bank Robber momentarily DISTRACTED the Bank Tell presses the SILENT ALARM.
Harper is at the wheel PEELING an ORANGE. Gardner is SIPP a Coffee when a CALL comes over the Radio.
All cars. All Cars. We have a 2113 at the First national Bank on Smith and Byrne. Gardner SNATCHES the SPEAKER.
(into speaker) This is Car 59. We are en route.  66. Harper puts the orange down STARTS the engine.
(excited) Finally!
The Bank Teller STUFFS the MONEY into the rucksacks while being held at GUNPOINT by Bank Robber#3
(impatient ) Hurry it up! She moves FASTER.
Harper and Gardner Patrol car has arrived at the scene.
(smiling) We got them!

The GETAWAY CAR is parked across the STREET from the Bank The GETAWAY DRIVER sees the Patrol Car arriving and watch as Harper and Gardner jump out. A S.W.A.T Van pulls up behind them and and the S.W.A.T TEAM pours out of the Van and TAKES POSITION. He FRANTICALLY picks up his WALKIE TALKIE.
Shit! (frantic, into Walkie Talkie) Somebody hit the goddamn alarm!
Bank Robber#1 listens to the Getaway Driver on his Walkie Talkie.

_ (angry) Dammit! They hit the alarm! Bank Robber#3 out of FRUSTRAION turns and STRIKES the Ban Manager ACROSS the back of his head with his GUN. He then turns his attention to the TERRIFIED Bank Teller.
Get up bitch!  67. She stands and he PUSHES her ROUGHLY towards the Patrons.
(freaking out) What the hell are we going to do?
Shut up! We're going out the front as planned. (gestures to the Patrons) Grab some cover. Bank Robber#1 GRABS a TEENAGE GIRL from the floor. Her BOYFRIEND gets up and RUSHES the Bank Robber.
(yells) Get your hands off of her! The three Bank Robber's proceed to BEAT him DOWN. The Patrons SCREAM. Bank Robber#2 FIRES into the ceiling.
(shouts) Shut up!
Superman's eyes SNAP OPEN and he ROCKETS toward the City.
Bank Robber#3 GRABS Bank Robber#2's arm.
Quit it you idiot!
Gardner looks around IMPATIENTLY.
(impatient ) Why are we just standing here?
It's called protocol Guy.
It's called sitting on our as... Gardner is CUT OFF as a RED and BLUE blur SPEEDS past and THROUGH the Bank Entrance.  68.

Bank Robber#3 is SWEPT OFF his FEET and SLAMMED into the wall and to the floor. Bank Robber#2 DROPS to the floor and SCURRIES toward the exit. Bank Robber#1 finds himself FACE to FACE with the Man of Steel and OPENS FIRE but the PULVERIZED BULLETS BOUNCE HARMLESSLY off Superman's CHEST and he CRUSHES the GUN in ONE HAND.
Bank Robber#2 CRAWLS out of the Bank and towards the Cops Superman HOVERS out of the Entrance holding the other Ban Robber's by the BACK of their JACKETS.
(impressed) Would you look at that. Gardner SCOWLS. Superman LANDS and PLACES the Robber's on the ground.

They're all yours. Harper nods to Superman as he CUFFS and ARRESTS the Bank Robbers. The Patron's SLOWLY exit the Bank and look in AWE at thei SAVIOR. Harper's ORANGE hits Superman on the back of the head. He turns to see Gardner, looking PISSED.
(polite) Is there a problem officer?
(angry) Yeah. I don't see a badge. You can't just turn up and do our jobs when you feel like it.

Just trying to help. (Superman points across the street at the Getaway Car) You might want to question that man over there. I think he might have something to do with the robbery.  69. Gardner looks around see the Getaway Driver who's EYES BU OUT when he is discovered. The Getaway car FLEES the SCENE.
Goddammit ! Gardner and Harper JUMP into their Patrol Car and GIVE CHASE. Superman watches and smiles then takes off. The Cops, Bank Robbers and Patrons watch as he flies away
Luthor sits on his desk and DOWNS an energy drink. He has been watching the Bank Robbery on his computer monitors. Mercy steps out of the Elevator.
The contracts have been sent to Wayne Enterprises.
That should make the trust fund baby happy.
What about the break in at the research center?
(uninterested) What about it?
I think it deserves some attention. Luthor shifts around on his desk to face his assistant.
It's of no concern. We have what we need and we're on schedule.
There are security concerns at the complex. Very serious concerns. Somebody sold us out to the Themyscirians.
(matter of fact) It was Morgan.  70.
(shocked) You knew.
Morgan has a mercenary nature. He saw an opportunity and exploited it.
And what's to be done. He HOPS off his desk and walks over to the window and loo out over his CITY.
We exploit an opportunity. Contact Cain. She nods.
There is the matter of the conference. Have you reconsidered attending?
Why waste my time. I already know how all of this will play out.
I'll take care of the other matter. She leaves. Luthor returns to his seat and activates the Monitors whi display SEVERAL DIFFERENT ANGLES of a LARGE GATHERING of people.

SEVERAL MILITARY HELICOPTERS fly over Metropolis's larges park, CENTENNIAL PARK. The Park has been CORDONED off to the PUBLIC. Over a THOUSAND Military personnel, ARMY and MARINES, guard the Park. In the Middle of the Park a STAGE and a PODIUM has been ERECTED. HUNDREDS of SEATS surround the PODIUM in ROWS. Around the seats is yet another PERIMETER guarded by MARINES. TANKS CIRCLE the Perimeter. FIGHTER JETS make SWEEPS over head.

The MAIN ENTRANCE is guarded by DOZENS of ARMED MARINES.  71. SEVERAL WORLD LEADERS and UNITED NATIONS OFFICIALS enter PARK. Behind railings HUNDREDS of REPORTERS and PAPARAZZI take PICTURES as the DIGNITARIES arrive. Bruce Wayne's Limo pulls up. He exits and enters the Park a CHORUS of: Mr Wayne! Mr Wayne! As the MEDIA spots him.
Lois, followed by Jimmy, walks towards an ENTRANCE to the Park which is GUARDED by TWO MARINES. Jimmy is FIDDLING with his CAMERA.
(irritated) Get your ass in gear Olsen!
Sorry I was just getting so many good shots.
I thought you wanted to see Superman?
He's here already?
He's about to be. Lois walks toward the Entrance but is stopped by a MARINE Lois FLASHES her CREDENTIALS
Centennial Park is off limits to press.
I'm Lois Lane. As a liaison with Superman I have expressed permission to be here by the U.S government. The Marine turns to his FELLOW SOLDIER who gets on the ra to get confirmation on Lois' claims.
She checks out let her through. She moves past the Marines. Jimmy follows.
(awkwardly) I'm with Superman too.  72.
(irritated) Come on Olsen! He rushes past.
Wayne walks through a SECURITY CHECK into a SECTIONED OFF AREA of the Park. He cordially smiles as the ASSORTED WOR LEADERS present.
(booming) Bruce Wayne! Bruce turns to se GENERAL CANDY, the HIGHEST RANKING U.S ARMY FIGURE present. He stands with Swanwick, Silas and Stewart.
General.
You've met General Swanwick and Professor Stone before right?.
Mr. Wayne. He and Wayne shake hands.
Mr. Wayne Good to see you again.
Professor. They shake hands. Candy SLAPS Stewart on the shoulder.
And this is John Stewart. The toughest S.0.B to ever come out of the Corps. Used to be my right hand man before he went to work for the eggheads.
(to Wayne) Sir.
So what's your interest in Big Blue Wayne?  73.
The same as everyone else. I want to hear what he has to say.
(dismissive) Unless it's the oath of allegiance I'm not interested.
I think there's more at stake here than patriotism General. This is to determine if the Superman is an ally to the world not just American interests.
Look around you Wayne. Everybody here wants to know who the Alien calls boss. Let's just hope its Uncle Sam.
Well it's certainly not Mother Russia.
(laughs) I have to give it to him, he knows how to piss the commies off.
Looking at the faces here it seems he knows how to piss the whole planet off.
(to Stewart) And whats your take?
Same as you. I'm going to wait and see.
(laughs) John here has mellowed out some but trust me if Big Blue starts any more trouble this here's the last guy he'd want to mess with.
Good to know.
Mr. Wayne here isn't a fan of us Military types. His company won't build us any fancy gadgets.  74.
My company doesn't build weapons. I don't see war as good business.
Well lucky for us and our boys on the front LexCorp does. Amanda Waller walks past flanked by TWO ARMED BODYGUARDS.
Who's that?
Amanda Waller.
She used to be the Warden of Belle Reve before she became Senator. She's a mean piece of work. They don't call her the 'wall' for nothing. The GATHERING STARTS to CONVERGE towards the ASSEMBLY ARE
Looks like this party's about to start. Wayne and the others follow the crowd as they flow toward the Assembly Area.
The WORLD LEADERS and the assorted MILITARY OFFICIALS hav taken their seats. The SECRETARY GENERAL OF THE UNITED NATIONS take the Podi

This is a solemn occasion. A year ago today this city and our entire Civilization experienced an event unprecedented in our collective histories. Our world changed. We are now at a precipice. A turning point that will determine the future of our planet. And we'd these words I give you (gestures towards the sky) Kal El. A HUSH goes over the CROWD. Superman FLOATS above them an lands on the stage. MARINES raise their WEAPONS and the TANKS train their CANNONS on the Kryptonian.  75. Superman takes the Podium and looks out over the Assembly Lois watches him with CONCERN. Jimmy SNAPS pictures.

(takes a breath) My name is Kal El. I stand in front of you today as a gesture of peace. I know that my presence here has changed how the human race perceives itself. As a child I was sent here from my world Krypton but Earth has always been my home. It is where I was raised. Everything I know, everything I am comes from here. I am one of you. A DIPLOMAT yells from the audience. President
(shouts) You are not one of us!
I understand your fears. But I am not your enemy. Nelson stands up.
And what are our assurances?
All I can give you is my word.
That just isn't enough. If we are to trust you then we must know you.
I believe all the world needs to know is that I am here to help. To protect. I offer myself to humanity freely and without condition. DIPLOMAT stands.
(angry) . _ You attacked Russian Military.
They were firing on innocent Civilians. Russian civilians.
(shouts) Lies! That was an act of war.  76. The conference ERUPTS. The President holds up a FILE.

This file contains a list. In the past year you have been involved in several international incidents. Russia, Great Britain, China. The list goes on and on. You consistently interfere with world affairs with no regard to the consequences or legal ramifications of your actions.
I help where I can. I'm here to save lives. I can't afford to stop and consider what politicians will be inconvenienced by my actions.
And as noble as your motives may or may not be. You cannot expect us as a species to simply sit back and allow you to dictate the course of our history without our consent. Where is your authority?
Honestly I have none. I am not here to be a dictator. I'm here to serve the people of this planet in any way I can.

And therein lies the problem. who do you really serve? At the end of the day Kal El you answer to no one but yourself and that is a frightening concept. Stewart, who sits between Silas and Swanwick, leans towar the Professor.
I gotta give it to the lady. She ain't scared of no one. Man or alien. Silas nods. The President holds up a SECOND DOCUMENT.
I hold in my hand a United Nations Bill. Signed and ratified by every member state that demands you (MORE )
PRESIDENT NELSON (cont'd) surrender yourself to it's authority. If you are truly here to serve then serve the people of Earth by abiding by it's laws and institutions.
That is something I cannot do.
Can't or won't.
I am here to serve all humanity regardless of their allegiance. What you are asking my to do is take orders and eventually take sides.
Then I do not see how we can allow you to enforce your will on our way of life, regardless of your intentions. You're not leaving us much in the way of options. The BRITISH PRIME MINISTER stands.
You must agree to the U.N Bill. The Conference ERUPTS with CHEERS of SUPPORT for the BILL

But I will not be a prisoner or a pawn for government interests and that at the end of the day is what the Bill means. It's submission to an authority that I cannot recognize because it prevents me from serving all the people of the world. I will pledge myself to humanity but not to it's leaders. I'm sorry Mrs President. The Conference YELLS and MURMERS. Wayne sits in silence pondering this turn of events. Waller smiles to herself.
This is all Waller needs.
What do you mean?  78.

Superman has just thumbed his nose at every bureaucrat and politician on the planet. The President will sign off on Cadmus. This is exactly what she wanted. The Conference has gone CRITICAL. Lois shakes her head in DISGUST at the REACTION of the ASSEMBLY.
Please understand. I do this for the good of the world. Not despite it. I'm sorry. He LIFTS off and takes to the sky. The sound of a SONIC B echos through the Park as he leaves.
You will be.
