location: ACE O' CLUBS BAR, HOB'S BAY, METROPOLIS

text: BIBBO BIBBOWSKI, an UNSHAVED BEAR OF A MAN, tends BAR in DINGY Hob's Bay BAR. There are a FEW CUSTOMERS, MOSTLY DRUNKS. Through the entrance walks Mercy, carrying with her a BRIEFCASE. She walks past the bar towards a BOOTH ina darkened CORNER of the room. Sitting in the Booth is DAVID CANE, 50's, one of the Worl DEADLIEST ASSASSINS.
I would have preferred if you had picked a more discreet location.
Plain sight has always been my favorite form of discretion. (gestures for her to sit down) Have a seat. Mercy sits in the Booth opposite the Assassin. She puts t Briefcase on the table.
So I'm assuming you have agreed to our proposal or why else would I be here Mr. Cain.
Once you've agreed to my price.  79.
It's reasonable. It'll be half now and half on completion. She SLIDES the Briefcase over to him.
And this is?
One of the provisions of the agreement. Cain OPENS the Briefcase. He SMILES at the CONTENTS.
Consider it a gift. Good faith gesture but the Client insists you use it. If you don't we'll know and the agreement will be void.
Fair enough. Mercy nods and stands.
It's very public. You sending a message?
In a manner of speaking. She leaves.
Federov sits at a Computer Terminal reading over endless DATA and COMPUTER CODE.
Burning the midnight 011? Federov jumps out his seat, STARTLED. Luthor steps out from behind the Ultimate's Incubation Chamber and SMILES.
(worried) Luthor! What are you doing here? Luthor presses the control to open the Chamber and looks the sleeping Ultimate.
Just checking up on my investment.  80.
If anyone finds you in here...
They'll forget they saw me or end up being forgotten. There's something I need from you.
I can't. Not again. Luthor gets close to the COWERING Scientist.
You can and you will. (gestures to the Ultimate) You've already done what I needed you to do. What else can't you do?
(pleading) Please. Luthor walks past Federov to the Computer Terminal and casually attaches a FLASHDRIVE to the HARDDRIVE.
There was an incident at the research center. An attack. Some of the material was taken.
The subjects?
It's insignificant. But I want to make sure there are no setbacks on this end. Federov watches the code FLASHING across the Computer screen.
That's the Ultimate program data. If Waller finds out.

I don't see how she will. (removes the flashdrive and puts it in his pocket) And if she does I'll make sure you'll be back in the shack in Chechnya where I found you. Federov lowers his head as Luthor passes and PATS him on back.  81.
Keep up the good work. It's what you live for. As he walks he receives a CALL on his CELLPHONE.
(into phone) Success?
Mercy sits in the back of the Limo on her Cell.
Was there ever any doubt?
Not at all. I'll see you at the party. She hangs up.

Diana stands POISED. She HOLDS her SHIELD tight against h chest and her SWORD pointed in front of her. Her eyes are CLOSED. Suddenly she EXPLODES into a SPECTACULAR COMBAT ROUTINE. SWINGS her Sword with expert GRACE and FLUIDITY. She is FRIGHTENING and BEAUTIFUL to BEHOLD. Her speed is SUPERNATURAL. SHe is a BLUR of FLESH and STEEL moving in PERFECT SYNC. She finishes and DROPS to one knee her Sword and Shield b her side. She OPENS her eyes. In front of her arranged like an ALTER is her ARMOR (CHESTPIECE which is MOLDED into an EAGLE, SILVER GAUNTLE and a HELMET shaped like the SPARTAN WARRIORS VISOR with RED STAR emblazoned upon its BROW) She RESTS her forehead on the HILT of her Sword and PRAYS her GODDESS. Io enters. 10 Your highness. The arrangements have been made. Diana stands and places her Shield with her Armor.
Good. Let me meet this little King.  82.

It is the GRAND OPENING of Lex Luthor's SKYSCRAPER, THE SPIRE. At 150 STORIES it is the TALLEST STRUCTURE in Metropolis. LIMO'S and SPORTS CARS pull up outside. CELEBRITIES and DIGNITARIES walk the RED CARPET into the Skyscraper.

The Spire's BALL ROOM is host to the WORLD'S ELITE. The REVELLERS party and mingle amid the TABLES which are stocked with DELICACIES and DISHES from all over the worl Clark and Lois walk through the PLUSH PARTY.
You look uncomfortable.
It's the suit. It's a little tight around the neck.
Give it here. Lois adjusts his collar.
Better?
I like my other one better.
Well you can't wear that here. Half the people here are from countries that want you arrested. Clark smiles. Martha appears behind them in a BEAUTIFUL DRESS and with GLASS of CHAMPAGNE.
(excited) I just saw Bruce Springsteen. He's got more grey hair than me. (she pinches Clark's cheeks) Look at you in a suit.
Are you drunk?  83.
(shakes the glass) On this stuff. Not hardly. They got any of the good stuff? Louis points to the other side of the room.
I saw a bar over that way. What do you say we prop it up?
Lois! (exasperated) ois!
Babe. I'm at a party thrown by a man I loath. If you think I'm not going to have a few shots you're mistaken.
(relents) Fine. Just don't let Mom get wasted.
(indignant ) Aw don't yourself. Martha grabs Lois' arm and leads her towards the Bar.
(to Lois) He brought his suit didn't he.
It's in the car. He wanted to wear it under his clothes. Martha laughs OUT LOUD startling some guests.
(calls) Lois. Lois sees Perry and Jimmy among the Attendees.
(to Martha) I'll catch up. Martha heads to the bar while Lois joins Perry and Jimmy.
I didn't expect you to turn up.  84.
Far be it from me to let old grudges color my professionalism.
(sarcasm) I'll bet. (firmly) Don't make a scene.
Honestly I'm here for the drinks. If you'll excuse me. Lois leaves to join Martha at the bar.
(to Perry) You think she's telling the truth.
Of course not. Bruce Wayne walks through the room followed by Alfred. A WAITER offers him some champagne. He declines.
Should I see if they have gingerale Master Bruce.

Please. Alfred leaves to get the gingerale. Wayne continues to walk through the party until he spies Woman in a STUNNING RED DRESS standing looking out of the window at the CITY LIGHTS. He approaches her.
I can tell you didn't grow up ina city. Diana turns to face Wayne.
Not like this. How could you tell?
City people are rarely so taken with the lights. (reaches out his hand) Bruce Wayne. Diana shakes his hand.  85.
Diana.
A pleasure to meet you.
Likewise Mr Wayne.
Please Bruce. I can't place your accent.
I come from Themyscira.
I've heard it's beautiful. I've never been.
My country doesn't interest men like you. We are not Monaco. We have no casinos.
(jokingly) I could have some built for you.
I'm sure.
What brings you to Metropolis?
I am looking for someone.

Lucky someone. Perhaps I can help you find them. The Attendees of the party turn their attention to the Ba Room's entrance. Luthor has arrived dressed in a SLEEK BLACK SUIT with Mer on his arm. He walks to the center of the room and the crowd GATHERS around him.
(polite) I won't be needing your help, thank you. Excuse me Mr. Wayne.
Bruce.  86. She walks past Wayne towards the crowd. As she does Jimmy SMILES at her.
(confident ) Hey there. She IGNORES him and walks past him.
(rejected) Bye there. Martha, visibly TIPSY, appears and links arms with him.
I think you're punching a little above your weight. Jimmy nods as she leads him toward the crowd. Luthor TAKES THE FLOOR. He TAPS a SPOON against a WINE GLASS to get everyones attention.

Ladies and gentlemen let me thank you for coming. The crowd ERUPTS in APPLAUSE. Clark pushes his way AWKWARDLY past people. He STOPS when he sees Diana. She sees him too and both LO EYES. Recognizing each others HIDDEN POWER.

And I like to welcome you to the Spire. She was started less than a year ago today. I built it to honor the city and the strength of its people. She will stand as a beacon. Shining even brighter than the star that is my home, Metropolis. To light the way for mankind. As a tribute to our potential. An example of the greatness we are capable of achieving. A symbol we can touch. That represents the dream within us all. Of the heights humanity can aspire to and the depths of human sacrifice to be. The people of this city raised the Spire and it is they who I honor here tonight. I believe in humanity. I believe in us. He raises his glass to THUNDEROUS APPLAUSE.  87. Luthor, withMercy, moves through the crowd.
Very inspiring. Luthor turns to see Lois and Martha by the bar. Mercy steps in front of her Boss, DEFENSIVELY.
(to Mercy) It's fine. (to Lois) It's a nice surprise to see you here.
Wouldn't miss it. It was quite a speech.
Thank you Ms. Lane. You're not the only one who's good with words.
Except I don't write fiction.
You write slander.
Perry White maybe bound by some misplaced Hob's Bay code of honor. But I'm not. You may live far above the law but all that means is you have further to fall. Luthor smiles at Lois' VEILED threat.
The only thing I'm above Ms. Lane is indulging in fantasy. Enjoy the party. Luthor leaves. Mercy GLOWERS at Lois before following him
Slimy little punk.
Cain, dressed in an OIL BLACK SUIT, opens up the Briefcas Inside the case is the PARTS of a POWERFUL HIGH-TECH SNIP RIFLE. He ASSEMBLES the WEAPON.  88.
Diana approaches Clark.
You're not like these people.
(intrigued) Neither are you. Who are you?
A warrior. Like you.
I'm not a warrior. Diana begins to circle him.
You have the power of a one. Yet you conceal it But I see you for what you are. You're the one he wants to kill.
who?
Their little King. He hates you. She glances as Luthor.
(confused) Lex Luthor? Lois and Martha walk up behind Clark.
Who's your friend?
(to Diana) I didn't get your name.
Diana.
Hi. Mind if I steal Clark away? Lois GRIPS Clark's forearm and LEADS him away.
(to Diana) You're sniffing around the wrong rooster stretch. You're a big one (MORE )
MARTHA (cont'd) but that girl there is pretty scrappy. (genuine) Nice dress. Diana smiles at Martha.
Cain takes aim at the Ball Room.
Lois has pulled Clark to a corner of the Hall.
(playful) So who was that?
She's different. There's something about her.
And what's that supposed to mean?
It's not like that she's different from everybody.
(surprised) Like you?
No. She's something else. Luthor leans against a table and SWIPES his finger across the screen of his Cellphone.
Cain's rifle begins to EMIT a HIGH FREQUENCY SOUND that i INAUDIBLE to HUMAN HEARING.
Clark WINCES in PAIN. His head BEGINS to POUND as he hear RINGING in his EARS.
(concerned) Clark! What's wrong?
(in pain) I don't know! Something!  90. He Looks out of the window and uses his SUPER VISION to s out of the window and across to the HIGHRISE. He sees Cai with his RIFE AIMED.
Take cover!

What's happening? Clark doesn't answer. He RUSHES out of the party BUMPING into guests as he does. Diana is STALKING Luthor through the party. Luthor walks up to Edge who is FLIRTING with TWO MODELS a places is hand on his shoulder.
(grins widely) Lex. Some party man.
Cain takes aim. SCOPE VIEW: The CROSS HAIRS are AIMED at the back of Luthor's head.
Luthor looks Edge right in the eyes. Edge is visibly UNCOMFORTABLE.

It is easier to forgive an enemy than to forgive a friend. (smiles) William Blake. Edge realizes he has been found out and nods his head sheepishly. Luthor gives him a friendly PAT on the CHEEK and turns hi head slightly.
SCOPE VIEW: Luthor has moved out of the way and now the cross hairs are on Edge. Cain PULLS THE TRIGGER.

Diana steps toward Luthor. Suddenly the window SHATTERS and Cain's BULLET FINDS it's MARK.  g1. Morgan Edge falls to the floor with a SINGLE BULLET HOLE his FOREHEAD. The Guests SCREAM and the party turns to CHAOS. Luthor's BODY GUARDS snatch him up and RUSH him out of th hall. Martha is KNOCKED to the floor by a FLEEING GUEST.
(shouts) Martha. Wayne RUSHES to her aid and helps her up from the floor.
(to Wayne) Thanks handsome.
(to Lois) Get her out of here. Lois and Jimmy escort Martha out.

Cain is ready to make his escape when BOOM! Superman CRAS through the wall. He SNATCHES the Rifle which is still EMITTING the high pitched noise. He CRUSHES it. Superman SHAKES off the effects of the sound and sets his sights on Cain. Cain takes a step back and pulls TWO HIGH POWERED HANDGUN He FIRES at the Kryptonian but the bullets BOUNCE off his chest. Superman LUNGES forward with his SUPER SPEED and GRABS Ca by the THROAT. A HIDDEN CAMERA is PLACED in the corner of the room. It RECORDS the scene.
Luthor watches the scene on his Cellphone. He SWIPES his finger across the screen and a SCREEN APPEARS with the wo "DETONATE' on it. He PRESSES it.
Superman uses his X-RAY VISION to see that EXPLOSIVES are CONCEALED in the WALLS of the room. They BEGINS to GLOW R and BURN.  92. Cain sees this.
(to himself) Son of a bitch. The EXPLOSIVES DETONATE.

Everybody is EVACUATING the Spire through the main entran including Wayne and Alfred when the TOP FLOORS of the Highrise EXPLODE in a BALL OF RED FLAME. Huge chunks of DEBRIS fall from the sky down onto the str and BYSTANDERS. One such CHUNK falls DIRECTLY in the path of an oncoming BUS. The DRIVER swerves as it SMASHES the windscreen and CAREENS toward the evacuating guests.

(shouts) Everybody move! People RUN and JUMP out of the way of the Bus which CRASH through the entrance to the Spire DESTROYING the GLASS EXTERIOR of the BUILDING before coming to a VIOLENT HALT. Diana stands in front of the Bus HOLDING it in place with her BARE HANDS. The Driver looks at her in SHOCK. Wayne looks around to see if anyone is injured and to his SHOCK and HORROR he sees Alfred laying on the ground. The Butler has a DEEP GASH in his FOREHEAD and his RIGHT ARM TWISTED and BROKEN. Wayne RUSHES to his side. Lois, Martha and Jimmy look up at the SMOKING REMAINS of Highrise and see Superman floating there holding in his hands the CHARRED remains of Cain's black suit. Wayne sees the Kryptonian and his eyes are filled with ANGER.

The STUDIO is SMALL but COSY and filled with KEEPSAKES fr Superman's TRAVELS. Clark sits in the DARK with his head hanging, GUILTY. In his HANDS he holds the CHARRED PIECE of Cain's SUIT. The FRONT DOOR opens and Lois enters, closing the door behind her QUIETLY.  93. She walks around and KNEELS in front of him.
(comforting) Tell me what happened.
(guilty) I failed.
It's not your fault.
(emotional) People were hurt because of me. They're right. I am a threat. Lois CARESSES his face and KISSES him on the forehead.

Alfred lies SEDATED on a HOSPITAL BED. His HEAD WRAPPED i BANDAGES and his ARM in a CAST. Wayne stands by his Butler's side, looking GRIM. He puts his hand on Alfred's forehead for a moment before leaving.
Wayne steps out into the Hallway where LESLIE THOMPSON, 60's, HUGS him TIGHT.
Thanks for coming.
Will he be okay?
He will be. They'll keep him in for observation. I'd like for you to take him back to Gotham when he's ready.
Of course.
Thank you.
What about you? Wayne WALKS AWAY down the Hallway.  94.
There's something I have to do.

Bruce Wayne thinkers with a DEVICE on a workbench in the SECRET ARMORY beneath the Wayne Enterprises Metropolis Offices. The Armory is a smaller Batcave. Large MONITORS hang. on walls along with various HIGH TECH GADGETS. Different VEHICLES are covered in TARPS. He raises the Device and it is revealed he is wearing a REINFORCED METAL GAUNTLET. He FLEXES the FINGERS and they WHINE electronically.
Impressive tech but it won't get the job done by itself. Bruce WHIPS around to see Luthor step out of the shadows, SMILING.
(surprised) How did you get past my security? Luthor WAVES his Cellphone.
(smiles) I used my phone. I'd offer to upgrade your system but I doubt you'd get it. Old dogs, new tricks. Wayne turns his back on Luthor and returns to fine tuning his Gauntlet.
You can take your new tricks and leave Luthor.
You'll need some of my new tricks if you plan to go up against it. That is what your planning to do? Luthor sees a METAL COWL on the workbench.
Or is Batman going to do the honors?
(unperturbed) So you know who I am. You aren't the first.  95.
I don't care what you do with your nights.
Then why are you here?
I'm sorry about your Butler.
He's recovering.
I'm glad to hear. (beat ) You can't take it down by yourself.
We'll see.
You spoke of an alliance Bruce. I'm here to help.
There's nothing you have that I need. Luthor reaches into his jacket and removes a SMALL METAL CYLINDER. Housed in the middle of the CYLINDER is a GLASS VIAL containing a LUMINESCENT GREEN SUBSTANCE.
I have this. Wayne removes the Gauntlet and lays it down on the Workbe and turns towards Luthor. He eyes the Cylinder SUSPICIOUS
And that is?

A new trick. (he hands the Cylinder to Wayne) It's synthesized from a substance we uncovered from the Indian Ocean after they tried to terraform our planet. We believe its radioactive to them. Wayne eyes the GREEN LIQUID.
I'm not an assassin.  96.
It won't kill it. But it'll know what it's like to bleed. Wayne looks Luthor in the eyes.

(suspicious) What's your stake in this Luthor? Luthor SWIPES his finger ACROSS the SCREEN of his Cellpho THE MONITOR SCREENS on the Armory's walls FLICKERS to lif Displayed on the Screens is a series of PHOTOS of A PRETT YOUNG REDHEAD at VARIOUS STAGES of her life... COLLEGE

head_text.subj: GRADUATION... PARTYING WITH FRIENDS... KISSING HER

text: Her name was Lena. She was a PR executive for one of LexCorp's smaller divisions. The building she worked in was vaporized when the Alien's attacked. (beat ) They never found her body. (swipes his fingers across the phone and the monitors goes black) My sister was just one of thousands Wayne. How many more? Luthor turns to leave. Wayne contemplates the Cylinder in his hand.
You know where to find him? Luthor keeps walking.

It, Wayne. It's never to far from Lane. Luthor leaves. Wayne places the Cylinder on the workbench and picks up t metal Cowl and carries it toward TWO HUGE DOORS which SLI OPEN revealing a DARK ROOM. He enters.

location: BULLPEN, DAILY PLANET OFFICES LEXCORP PLAZA

text: The STAFF, including Lois and Jimmy, are all gathered aro a TV SCREEN watching a NEWS REPORT.  97.
Metropolis was shocked last night by the assassination of Morgan Edge. A PHOTO of EDGE appears on the SCREEN. A Picture
Edge who was head of Public Relations at LexCorp and an original member of Luthor's team was executed at last nights grand opening of Luthor's Spire. of David Cain appears.
The assassin has been identified as David Cain. The report cuts to Video of a JAPANESE WOMAN who is being escorted by ARMED F.B.I AGENTS.

This morning F.B.I Agents arrested Kord Industries C.E.0 Kimiyo Hoshi after seizing bank accounts that allegedly show transactions between her and the assassin. Kord Industries has been a rival to LexCorp for several years. Superman's SYMBOL appears.
Cain was himself killed by the being known as Superman. Neither LexCorp nor Kord Industries could be reached for comment. Lois turns away from the Broadcast.
(irritated) Superman didn't kill anybody. He was set up.
The whole world is saying he did. And with injuries and property damage they're going after him big time.
This has Luthor's stink all over it. I'm going home. Take care Olsen.  98.
G'night Lois. She leaves.
Lois enters her apartment and closes the door. She CLICKS the light switch. Nothing happens.
(irritated) Dammit. She uses the LIGHT of her Cellphone screen and walks towa the Kitchen and opens a drawer to find a light bulb.
Where is he? Lois almost JUMPS OUT OF HER SKIN and turns to see Batman SILHOUETTE against the living room window.
Oh my god. She runs for the door. A Batarang STICKS into the wall in front of her and she STOPS in her tracks. When she turns around Batman is standing right in front o her.
I'm not going to hurt you.
What do you want from me?
I want you to give him a message. 85th and Shuster. Tonight. He PULLS the Batarang from the wall and leaves.
Clark's Cellphone VIBRATES on his Coffee table. He snatches it up.
Lois?
Superman lands on the street between the ROWS and ROWS of UNDER CONSTRUCTION BUILDINGS.  99.

Superman turns to see Batman down the street behind him. Batman wears a SUIT of PROTECTIVE ARMOR. His GLOVES are HYDRAULIC GAUNTLETS. His COWL is now a REINFORCED METAL HELMET and his eyes are hidden behind SNOW WHITE LENSES. CAPE flows in the wind. He steps forward, his HEAVY BOOTS THUDDING against the street. Superman LEVITATES off the ground and slowly DRIFTS towar Batman. He comes to a halt and the Man of Steel and The Dark Knig STARE EACH OTHER DOWN.
(angry) ; If you have something to say, say it now... (scans Batman with his X-Ray vision) Bruce Wayne.
(undaunted) You're dangerous Kal.
They say the same about you.
All you are is power and no control.
And all you are is a scared man in a mask who threatens women.
(smiles slightly) I don't threaten Kal. You have two choices. Agree to the U.N proposal.
And be a prisoner?
It's better than the alternative.
Which is?
Your threat ends permanently  100. Superman stares into the Batman's COLD WHITE EYES.
(firmly) Go near Lois Lane again and I promise you you'll regret it. We're done here. Superman turns to leave. Batman GRABS his shoulder.
(angry) Let go.
Can't you see? The lives that you're putting in danger? The lives you've already cost?

I said... (eyes glow) Let... GO! He PUSHES Batman's CHEST PLATE and sends the Vigilante reeling backwards and SLAMMING ROUGHLY into a PARKED CEME TRUCK. Superman looks back at Batman, REGRETFUL of what he's jus done.

(whispers) You brought this on yourself. He reaches behind his CAPE and produces a SILVER GRENADE. He PULLS the PIN and THROWS it. Superman CATCHES the grenade. BOOM! -- It EXPLODES engulfing him in a THICK GREEN SMOKE Superman COUGHS and SPLUTTERS as the SMOKE FILLS HIS LUNG The SMOKE CLEARS and Superman hears the sound of HYDRAULI JOINTS MOVING and then -- BAM! Batman LANDS a CRUSHING RIGHT CROSS directly across Superman's JAW. STAGGERING him. Superman STUMBLES back trying to STEADY himself. Batman follows up with a CRUSHING ONE TWO COMBO sending Superman further back and then down to ONE KNEE. BLOOD TRICKLES down his CHIN. Batman stands above him.  101. Through Superman's eyes: his vision is BLURRED.
(confused) What have you done to me?

(smiles) Evened the odds. Superman GRITS his TEETH and LIFTS OFF. He SPEAR TACKLES Batman. He flies forward SMASHING his opponent BACKWARDS through WALL of an UNDER CONSTRUCTION building and SLAMS him to t ground. Batman GRIPS Superman by the THROAT and SQUEEZES trying t CUT OFF the Man of Steel's AIR SUPPLY. He DIGS his BOOTS into the CONCRETE floor and HEADBUTTS Superman. Superman PUNCHES Batman in the CHEST and sends him throug WINDOW and out into the street. Batman ROLLS OVER and as he does he PULLS another GRENADE and THROWS it back through the window. It EXPLODES bringing the ENTIRE BUILDING down onto Superm The Man of Steel throws the debris off. Batman ATTACKS again. He throws a PUNCH which Superman CATCHES in his fist and retaliates with a COUNTER PUNCH which Batman CATCHES. Both Men engage in a TEST of STRENGTH.
You're feeling it now. What it's like to be human.
(struggling) Why are you doing this?
Because no one else can. Superman, even in his DIMINISHED state gains the UPPER HA
And if you beat me... SPARKS fly from Batman's ARM JOINT as his Armor begins to FALTER.  102.

. who do they send after you? Superman's EYES GLOW RED and he EMITS a BLAST of HEAT VIS which IMPACTS Batman's Chest Plate causing it to melt. Batman releases his GRIP and is sent HURTLING backwards i another CONSTRUCTION SITE and DISAPPEARS from view. Superman tries to SHAKE the FOG from his VISION. He wipes the BLOOD from his CHIN. With some EFFORT he TAKES OFF. A HIGH TENSILE CORD wraps around Superman's ANKLE and he STALLS in MID AIR. Beneath him Batman, BLOOD DRIPPING from his own mouth, SM rising from his Armor has CONNECTED the other end of the WIRE to a BULLDOZER which is being DRAGGED SLOWLY ACROSS ground. The Dark Knight pulls a POWERFUL TASER from his BELT and ELECTROCUTES the WIRE. Superman YELLS out in PAIN as the WAVES of ELECTRICITY COURSE through his body. Batman TOSSES the Taser aside, and COILS the WIRE around FOREARM and pulls the WEAKENED Man of Steel back to Earth He SLAMS VIOLENTLY into the ground. Before he can stand Batman is already upon him and WRAPS Wire around Superman's NECK and PULLS the Cord TIGHT.

(smiles) There is no one. Superman GASPS for AIR then JUDO THROWS Batman over his shoulder SLAMMING him into the GROUND and STOMPING on his CHEST and PINNING him. He flies off taking Batman, whose arm is still WRAPPED in the wire, with him.

Superman flies high above the RUINED sections of Metropol CARRYING Batman with him. Batman SKIMS across the roof of whats left of a SKYSCRAPE He DIGS his FEET into the roof TEARING up CONCRETE as he' DRAGGED towards the EDGE. He stops at the edge and WITH A HIS STRENGTH pulls the Cord stopping Superman.  103. His suits joints WHINE as he SWINGS Superman down onto th roof. Superman STANDS and moves out of the way just in time to AVOID a KICK from Batman. Superman PUNCHES Batman in the CHEST sending him SKIDDING BACKWARDS toward the EDGE of the roof.

(weak) That was two ribs. (coughs) Don't make me do this. Batman SPITS blood and then WIPES his mouth before THROWI a Batarang at Superman. The Man of Steel catches the device which STARTS to BEEP then EXPLODES. Batman CHARGES and TACKLES Superman CLEAR OFF the roof. Both Men SMASH through and the wall of an adjacent DEMOLISHED BUILDING and CRASHES down through FLOOR after FLOOR. Batman FIRES a GRAPPLING HOOK which CATCHES as Superman FALLS until he IMPACTS on the ground floor. He lies there, his breathing LABOURED and looks up throug the HOLES in the FLOORS above him. He STRUGGLES to his feet and STAGGERS out through the CRUMBING LOBBY of what USED to be an OFFICE BUILDING. He STUMBLES and FALLS to his knees and finds himself face face with a HUMAN SKULL. He RECOILS in HORROR.
(solemnly) This is what happens when power goes unchecked Kal. Batman is standing behind him.

You're a nuclear bomb and this is the fallout. Superman takes a LABORED BREATH and raises his FISTS. Batman attacks with a LIGHTNING FAST COMBINATION of PUNCH before terminating with a SIDE KICK which sends Superman backwards through a CRUMBLING WALL. Superman CRASHES out into the STREET.  104. He gets to his feet. He's coughing HARDER now. Batman walks slowly out of the Ruined Office Building. Hi Armor's damaged joints SPARKING. He throws a POWERFUL HAYMAKER but Superman is FASTER and BLOCKS the ATTACK and FIGHTS BACK. He lands a POWERFUL BLOW to Batman's GUT denting his Armo The Dark Knight SPITS out a GOB of BLOOD. Superman attacks again but Batman BLOCKS, PARRIES and COUNTERS. Superman is still STRONGER and FASTER but Batman's EXPERT FIGHTING ABILITIES nullifies Superman's attack. He STRIKES the Man of Steel in the THROAT. Superman falls one knee.

I won't kill you... (He strikes Superman in the chest) But I want you to remember Kal in all the years to come... (catches Superman across the jaw) In all your most private moments (Kicks his knee and elbows him under the jaw) That you're not a god... Superman is BREATHING HEAVILY, TOTALLY SPENT.
That for all your power, for all your strength... He GRABS Superman by the THROAT and leans in CLOSE. He RELEASES his grip on Superman's throat and DROPS him t the ground.
I'm the one who beat you. Superman lies, BEATEN.
All this... (gestures to the ruins around them) Is because someone like you didn't know control.  105. Batman turns his back on the FALLEN KRYPTONIAN and walks away.

I won't let it happen again. He STOPS when he hears MOVEMENT and turns around. Superman has GOTTEN BACK TO HIS FEET and is STANDING DEFIANTLY. With his FINAL OUNCES of STRENGTH he LAUNCHES at Batman SPEAR TACKLING him back through a CHUNK OF WALL that is JUTTING from the ground and into a BUILDING. Superman holds Batman pressed AGAINST the wall and THROWS WEAK PUNCHES into Batman's RIBS.

(yelling) I tried to save them! I TRIED! Batman HEADBUTTS Superman and sends him to the ground. The Dark Knight is SEEING RED now and GRABS Superman by h SYMBOL of HOPE. He begins to RAIN DOWN PUNCHES much the s as he did with ZSASZ.
(in a frenzy)
Superman is TOTALLY DONE now and can no longer even DEFEN himself. He starts to go limp.
(whispers) I'm... Sorry...
You f... (whispers) . failed. Batman STOPS, his breath is in SHORT GASPS, and looks dow on the BEATEN and BLOODIED Superman.
Batman is cradling the dead body of JASON TODD dressed in the 'ROBIN' Armor.

Batman let's go of Superman, HORRIFIED by his ACTIONS, an SLUMPS against the wall. He sits down across from Superma Batman REMOVES his DENTED METAL COWL revealing his face which is BRUISED and SWOLLEN. Both Men are SILENT for a moment.
You held back. You could have killed me couldn't you? Superman doesn't answer just sits up against the wall acr from Wayne.
Why didn't you?
I figured I could reason with you Bruce.

You weren't talking to Bruce Wayne. (picks up his Cowl and ponders it) You can't reason with anger and regret. He TOSSES the Cowl ASIDE. Superman looks around at the DESOLATE surroundings, MOURNFULLY.
I didn't want this. I wanted to save them. All of them. I thought I could. I never knew I could fail so badly. Wayne is silent for a moment contemplating the BEATEN Kryptonian in front of him.
You never do until it happens and when it does it breaks you. (beat ) His name was Jason Todd. Superman looks into Wayne's PAIN FILLED EYES.
He was like you, (beat ) ...Dangerous. I thought I could help him, train him, make him (MORE )
WAYNE(CON'T) (cont'd) better. Instead I got him killed. (voice cracks) He was like my son. He was my son and I failed him.
What do you do with it? With the guilt.
I lost myself to it. I forgot who I was. I didn't want to stop my enemies anymore all I wanted to do was hurt them.
All I want to do is save them. Both Men sit in silence finally UNDERSTANDING one another Superman, still in PAIN, gets to his feet.

I'm not your enemy Bruce. He reaches out his hand to Wayne. Wayne TAKES Superman's hand and gets to his feet. Superman and Batman stand HANDS TOGETHER. Superman suddenly DOUBLES over in PAIN. Batman CATCHES hi before he falls.
Silas Stone. Get me to Silas Stone.

location: BEDROOM, SECOND FLOOR, SILAS STONE'S HOUSE

text: Silas Stone WAKES and sees Batman standing above him. Bef he can SCREAM Batman COVERS his mouth with his hand.
(whispers) Don't scream.
Batman leads Silas down the stairs and through his LIVING ROOM towards the kitchen. Inside he clicks on the light. He GASPS when he sees a SICK and SEMI-CONSCIOUS Superman.
(shocked) Oh my God!  108.
He needs your help.
What happened?
He's been poisoned. Silas RUSHES to Superman's side and looks into his EYES which have taken on an EERIE GREEN COLOR.
Poisoned? Who did this?
(matter of fact) I did.
We need to get him to S.T.A.R Labs. There's nothing I can do for him here. Suddenly Victor STORMS into the kitchen WIELDING a BASEBA BAT.
(shouts) Dad! Get back! He SWINGS WILDLY at Batman who GRACEFULLY DODGES the ATTA Superman STIRS and Victor SWINGS at him. Superman simply CATCHES the bat..
(shouts) Victor stop! Batman GRIPS Victor's forearm TIGHT.
Listen to the man son. Victor's eyes meet Batman's GAZE and he CALMS. Batman tak the shattered bat from him.
They're friends.
(shocked) Batman? Batman nods.
You're real?  109. Silas tries to lift Superman. He STRUGGLES.
Victor help get him to the car. Victor helps Batman get Superman to his feet and help him walk out of the house.

Superman is UNCONSCIOUS and lies on a TABLE while his bod is SCANNED by Silas who watches intently at the DATA on h COMPUTER SCREEN. Batman stands at his side, watching. Victor leans against the wall. He feels totally OUT OF PLACE.
How is he?
He's lucky. I've managed to isolate the compound in his blood stream. He's severely weakened and he'll need time to recover but he'll live.
Good. Silas turns around in his seat.
You did this to him?
Yes. I thought he was a threat. I was wrong.
This compound is unlike anything I've seen. The effect it has on Kryptonian physiology. How did you get come by it? You don't strike me as a scientist.
It was given to me.
By who?
A manipulative narcissist.
Lex Luthor.  110.
(impressed) You'd make a good detective.
I've just seen the evidence and although I can't prove anything Lex Luthor has been the money behind several projects that from what I've seen all have one purpose.
To kill the Superman.
What are you going to do?
Expose him.
Easier said than done. Lex Luthor buries all evidence. There's never been anything to connect him to the things he's done.
I'll dig. I'll find something. I used to be a detective. Once upon a time. He turns to leave and walks past Victor.
(to Victor) That's some swing. I think you picked the wrong sport. Victor smiles.
What do you want me to tell him when he wakes up? Batman STOPS.
Tell him I'm sorry. He leaves.

It's EARLY morning and the Sun is RISING above the Metropolis skyline in the distance. Bruce Wayne's Limo is parked on the side of a lonely DIRT ROAD.  111. A WHITE LIMO pulls up on the ADJACENT side. Mercy steps o of the driver's side and walks around to the rear door an opens it. Luthor steps out. Wayne, still sporting BRUISES, steps out of his Limo and both Men STARE EACH OTHER DOWN for a moment from across their respective sides.
You look better than I expected.
I don't appreciate being manipulated.

Then you shouldn't have made it so easy. Who would have thought tragedy would motivate you so. I needed to test a weapon and the opportunity presented itself. You don't use a sword without knowing its sharp.
I know you were behind Edge's murder.
(scratches his chin dismissively) So you know my dirty little secret and I know yours. You know what that is?
Stalemate.
More accurately I win.
I'm not about to let you walk away from this.

There's nothing you can use against me. You can't connect me to anything. So don't waste your breath on empty threats. But I know everything about you Wayne. Grayson, Gordon, what really happened to Jason Todd. At the mention of Jason Wayne CLENCHES his fists.
You can't threaten me Luthor.  112.
I'm not threatening you Wayne. I'm threatening every single person you care about. And there's nothing you can do about it. Luthor nods to Mercy. Who opens the door for him.
Go back to roughing up psychos in Gotham. (smiles) And hope no more kids die in the process. Wayne's is ANGRY but keeps his COMPOSURE.
You tried to stab a god in the back Luthor. Luthor leans into the Limo.
(smiles) And now he knows who's hand held the knife. Luthor pauses and looks over his shoulder slightly.
We are done here. Luthor sits into the Limo and Mercy closes the door. Wayne watches as the Limo as it drives away.
Superman opens his eyes to see Victor sitting beside him.
(confused) Where am I?
S.T.A.R Labs. My father and Batman brought you here. You were sick.
How long was I out?
About 15 hours. Superman sits up slowly.
And Silas?  113.
He'll be back. Superman touches his SWOLLEN jaw.
I must look as bad as I feel.
Then you must feel pretty damn bad. Did Batman do that to you? Superman nods.
How? He's just a man? Silas enters the room.
He cheated.
How do you feel?
What did he do do me?
You were poisoned by a radioactive substance. Kryptonian in origin.
(surprised) Kryptonian? How?
Lex Luthor. He must have synthesized from a by product from the World Engine's terraforming. Superman stands.
I have to go. People will be worried. He walks towards the exit past Silas.
Matters are much worse. Superman stops.
(regretful) I should have told you.  114.
Told me what?
There is a Project called Cadmus. They've found a way to replicate Kryptonian DNA using your people's technology.
(realization) The Genesis Chamber.

They've created a weapon with one purpose. To kill you. And Lex Luthor is behind it all. What happened last night was only a test of your weaknesses. Superman CONTEMPLATES the information for a moment.
Thank you Silas. For everything. Superman continues toward the exit.
He said he was sorry. Superman stops by the exit and LEANS against it with one hand to stay STEADY.
The Batman, he said he was sorry. Superman responds to Victor's words with a nod and leaves
Luthor exits the Elevator and walks over to his Bar where removes and Energy drink for the fridge and cracks it ope He SMILES.

I was wondering when you'd pay me a visit. He turns. FLOATING outside the Window is Superman. ARMS FOLDED. He STARES a HOLE THROUGH Luthor. Luthor SWIPES his thumb across his Cellphone's screen and the Window's SLIDE OPEN. He walks out on the balcony to NEMESIS.  115.
Your assassin failed. Luthor TILTS his head and observes Superman's WOUNDS.
(smiles) I wouldn't say failed.
This has to end now Luthor.
It ends when you do. You brought a war to my city and it's only right I bring it right back to you.
You're a criminal and a murderer.
So are you.
I'll expose you. I'll show the world what you really are.

All the while hiding what you really are. You and Wayne are so alike. So righteous and so hypocritical. Both threatening to reveal the truth about me but when it.comes down to it he hides behind a mask and you behind a symbol. It's pathetic. And you think you can come here and intimidate me? You arrogant alien bastard. Superman doesn't respond.

And it's that arrogance that makes you weak. You float there with all your power but do you even know how you do it? You were given these gifts, you didn't do anything to earn them and you use them like a child would use a gun.
Bold words for a man who prefers someone else's finger on the trigger.
Well we all can't shoot fire from our eyes. (MORE)
LUTHOR (cont'd) (takes a gulp from his drink) I think you should float away now. Luthor turns his back on Superman.
You won't win.

I already have. The problem with you is that you are so assured that nothing I can do can hurt you. Yet you surround yourself with people I can hurt. (he turns to face Superman) Like Lois Lane. Superman's face betrays his EMOTION. The THREAT has made ANGRY.

Maybe I'll treat myself and buy the Planet. Change things around a little. By the time I'm done Lois Lane will by licking my boot heels just to cover a little league game. Superman LUNGES and GRABS Luthor by the THROAT.
(angry) . If you go near Lois Lane I'll...

(strained) You'll what kill me? Go ahead. Show the world what you really are. Even then I'll still win. Superman eases his GRIP on Luthor's throat. He TOSSES him back into the Penthouse Superman regains his COMPOSURE.

(composed) You say I hide behind a symbol. What really makes you angry is that you can't see what lies behind the symbol. But I can see you for what you really are. Luthor HOLDS his throat and COUGHS.  117.
Behind the money and the suits, behind LexCorp there is nothing but a terrified little street thug. Frightened of what he can't understand.
(angry) I understand you perfectly.
I'm not talking about me. I'm talking about a soul. In the end I'm more human than you'll ever be. Superman turns and FLIES away. Lex is LIVID. He stands and RUNS out onto the balcony.
(shouting, angry) You've made your last mistake! This City is mine! It's people are mine! I'm going to show them all you're nothing! I'm going to take everything from you! (whispers) Even your soul.
Lois is asleep on her bed. She awakes to see Superman at window. She JUMPS out of bed and HUGS him.
Where have you been? (sees his wounds, shocked) Oh my god what happened?
It's okay. I'm fine.
Your face?
Will heal. I just need to rest.
And the Batman?
He'll be just as sore as I am in the morning. (MORE )
SUPERMAN (cont'd) (falls on her bed) I just need to rest. Lois sits beside him and places her hand on his forehead he falls ASLEEP.
Luthor SITS on his DESK in the DARK. IMAGES of Superman FLICKER ACROSS the Monitors. ANGRY, he JUMPS up and SHATTERS ONE of the MONITORS.
Luthor SPLASHES water on his face and STARES at his REFLECTION in the MIRROR with a MANIACAL look in his eyes He GRABS and ELECTRIC RAZOR and begins to SHAVE his HEAD.
Mercy steps out of the ELEVATOR and is SHOCKED to see Lut SHAVEN HEADED and SHIRTLESS, revealing his TATTOOED BODY, sitting on his Desk.
(concerned) What's wrong?
(calm) Nothing. I just don't feel like hiding who I am anymore.
(unsure) Are you ok?
I'm better than Ok Mercy. (beat) At dawn I kill a god.
Several BLACK CARS pull up outside the INCONSPICUOUS BARN Out of the Cars emerge SEVERAL GOVERNMENT and MILITARY OFFICIALS including Swanwick, Stone, Stewart and General Candy.
(to Swanwick) Good to see you.  119.
You too Sir.
(gestures to Silas and Stewart) You must have pulled a few strings to get those two here?
Their my advisors.
Works for me. (Candy looks around) Where's Waller?
Here General. Waller stands by the BARN DOORS.
Glad you could make it General Candy. If you would be so good as to follow me.
(to others) You heard the lady. They all follow Waller into the Barn. Where they find tha the floor is SOLID CONCRETE.
Welcome to Cadmus. The FLOOR begins to DESCEND and they find themselves goin down into the Cadmus facility.

The OFFICIALS follow Waller into a AUDITORIUM where FEDER waits. They stand behind a LARGE THICK GLASS WINDOW which separa them from a LARGE ROOM with CONCRETE WALLS and two LARGE REINFORCED STEEL DOORS. Silas reaches out his hand to Federov.
Dr. Federov. I've read your work. It's quite an honor to finally meet you. Federov AWKWARDLY shakes Silas' hand.  120.
Thank you.
You'll have to excuse Dr. Federov what he lacks in social skills he makes up for in genius.
(to Waller) I'm sure. I'm very interested in seeing the results of your project Waller.
As am I.
I promise you General. What you see here today will make Superman look like a one of your grunts. (to Stewart) No offense.
None taken. Federov nods to Waller.
If you'll take your seats we shall begin. The Officials take their seats as Federov OPERATES his Tablet. The Steel Doors OPEN and a LARGE STEEL CAPSULE is WHEELED into the room by TwO TECHNICIANS.
Allow me to present the Ultimate. Federov ACTIVATES the Capsule. It OPENS to reveal THE ULTIMATE. The Creature's BODY is CONCEALED in a GREEN CONTAINMENT S with TWO RED EYES.
What is it?
It's a being of my design. Cloned from cells derived from an alien specimen.  121.
Kryptonian DNA is complex. How did you bridge the gaps between sequences.
We used DNA from compatible specimens.
Human?
In a manner of speaking. Silas is intrigued by Federov's answer.
What's with the suit?
Kryptonian abilities is dependent upon absorption of solar energy. We've enhanced that.
Which means?
We've made it stronger. The suit regulates how much the Ultimate absorbs.
Stronger's good.
(to Federov) I'm sure General Candy would appreciate a demonstration. Federov nods. He operates the Controls and the Ultimate STEPS out of th Capsule. It STOMPS over to the Concrete wall.
You're controlling it?
The Ultimate has been pre programmed to follow our commands.
Totally obedient. Completely under our control.  122.
(amused) Already better than the Superman.
You haven't seen anything yet. (to Federov) Sasha. Federov commands the Ultimate. The Creature PUNCHES through the CONCRETE WALL.
That's ten feet of solid concrete General. Candy is IMPRESSED.
Luthor watches the Ultimate's demonstration on his Comput Monitors. Mercy stands behind him.
The Ultimate REMOVES its FIST from the wall and stands in front of the WINDOW.
(to Waller) Well Amanda. I'm impressed.
Thank you general.
When can we expect to have this guy out on the front lines?
There are still a few more tests but I'm confident once President Nelson gives the go ahead we can have the Ultimate in the field within the year.
You have my vote. I'll support the Project. Several of the other Officials CONCUR with General Candy.
Big Blue won't be a problem anymore.  123.
Luthor fingers GLIDE over the KEYBOARD as he uploads NEW PROGRAMMING into the Ultimate's BRAIN. His hand hovers over the Keyboard. He EXECUTES the PROGRAM.
The Ultimate STANDS straight.
IMAGES FLASH through the Ultimate's mind -- SUPERMAN'S SYMBOL -- METROPOLIS -- FEDEROV.
The Ultimate walks toward the WINDOW.
growls)
(concerned) What's it doing? Waller and Federov turn. Federov tries to control the Creature but to NO AVAIL.
(to Federov) What's wrong?

(frantic) It's not responding to commands. The Ultimate PUNCHES through the GLASS and GRABS Federov the HEAD and PULLS him back through the WINDOW. Waller and the others back away from the Window and towar the EXIT. The Ultimate TOSSES the LIMP DEAD BODY of Federov ASIDE a proceeds to SMASH his way through the Window.

The Officials FLEE the AUDITORIUM. The Ultimate SMASHES through the WALL and ROARS. Stewart DRAGS Silas down the CORRIDOR as the Ultimate SMASHES through another wall.  124. Waller watches as the Creature SMASHES it's way through t Complex.

location: BARN ENTRANCE, PROJECT CADMUS, METROPOLIS OUTSKIRTS

text: The Rural outskirts are QUIET and SERENE. A FAINT SOUND o POUNDING can be heard. The sound gets LOUDER and LOUDER until the ground begins SHAKE and CRACK. BOOM! The Ultimate has PUNCHED it's way to the surface. I Containment Suit is TORN and SHREDDED. It's GREY skin and BONE LIKE PROTRUSIONS are visible. It looks to the SUN which is BLAZING overhead. It CELLS start to ABSORB the SOLAR ENERGY and it ROARS. It covers its EARS in an attempt to BLOCK the SOUNDS whic are AMPLIFIED by its ENHANCED KRYPTONIAN SENSES. It FOCUSES on the SOURCE of it's PAIN... METROPOLIS
A BIRD flies past and the Ultimate GRABS it from the AIR CRUSHES it. It ROARS again and JUMPS HIGH through the air in the direction of the City.
Clark's eyes SNAP OPEN. He can HEAR the Monster COMING. He gets out of bed and walks to the window. Lois walks into the room and sees him standing.
(concerned) You should be resting.
(worried) Call the Planet. We need to get everybody to safety.
Clark?
(grave) Somethings coming.  125.
The Ultimate LANDS and SMASHES through a HOUSE before JUMPING again.
PEDESTRIANS stop and listen as they hear the sound of HEA IMPACT getting LOUDER and LOUDER. Boom... Boom... Boom... BOOM!
Lois looks out of the window. She can hear IMPACT. Superman, FULLY SUITED, stands behind her. A ROAR echos throughout the City.
(shocked) What is that! Clark steps toward the window.
You can't go out there Clark you're still sick.
I have to.
No. You're too weak. He puts his hands on her shoulders.
Somethings out there and I have to stop it. Lois caresses the still NOT FULLY HEALED wounds on his fa
(softly) You were bleeding... I... I can't... He kisses her. A gust of wind BLOWS Lois' hair back as he FLIES out of t window.

METROPOLIS UNIVERSITY is FACING OFF against GOTHAM UNIVERSITY.  126. Victor stands with his TEAM waiting for the PLAY. The BALL is TOSSES to Victor who THROWS it ACROSS the PIT where it is CAUGHT by his TEAMMATE who RUNS for the TOUCH DOWN. The Stadium ERUPTS.
The Ultimate LANDS on the GROUND forming a CRATER right outside the CITY. He JUMPS AGAIN directly INTO to the City.

Both Teams have STOPPED playing. Like the Spectators they are more concerned with the soun of IMPACT getting ever CLOSER. People start to PANIC. Then BOOM! Parts of the PITCH are THROWN through the air the Ultimate SLAMS DOWN into the MIDDLE of the Stadium. The Spectators SCREAM and PANIC and RUSH toward the EXITS The Beast ROARS as it CHARGES the BLEACHERS and BEGINS to TEAR the Stadium APART. The Ultimate PUNCHES people aside ATTACKS indiscriminatel Victor watches as the Creature PURSUES a FAMILY (MOTHER, FATHER and INFANT SON). The Son TRIPS and FALLS as the Ultimate closes in on her. Victor sees this and RUSHES to his aid and with AMAZING SPEED snatches him up from the ground just as the Creatur SMASHES his FISTS into the ground. He gives the Child to his Parents.

(to Parents) Run! Just as he utters the words the Ultimate PUNCHES him ASID His body is THROWN through the air and SMASHES AGAINST th stands then onto the ground. He GASPS for air. He has suffered TERRIBLE INJURIES, his BODY is BROKEN. The Ultimate stands over him and is about to strike a KILLING BLOW when Superman TACKLES the Monster and PUSHES away from Victor.  127. Victor watches as both Superman and the Ultimate SMASH through the STADIUM WALLS and out into the street. He SCREAMS in pain as his TEAMMATES come to his aid.

The DUST settles and the Ultimate stands and sees a TRUCK which has come to a HALT in the middle of the street. The SOUND of the ENGINE is like a JACKHAMMER to the Creature. The Creature with speed equal to Superman RUSHES the Truc Before the Creature hits it Superman PULLS the DRIVER fre just it time. The Ultimate SMASHES it REPEATEDLY, completely PULVERIZIN it. Superman puts the Driver down and he runs to safety. The Ultimate sees the Man of Steel and focuses on the HOP symbol on his chest.
The IMAGES Luthor uploaded FLASH through the Ultimate's MIND.
(growls)
The Ultimate ROARS as it RECOGNIZES it's ENEMY.
Luthor watches the SATELLITE FEED of the Monster's RAMPAG on his Monitors, GRINNING. The Ultimate ROARS in ANGER as it recognizes it's ENEMY.

Superman and the Ultimate CHARGE each other. They COLLIDE and the SHOCKWAVE shatters windows for an ENTIRE CITY BLO Superman is PROPELLED BACKWARDS through the air and into street TEARING up the concrete before he comes to a halt. Before he can even come to his senses the Ultimate POUNCE on him and starts BEATING him down into the ground. Each BLOW shaking the ground like an EARTHQUAKE.  128. Superman catches the Ultimate's arms by the WRISTS and fl upward STRUGGLING with the Creature which CLAWS and KICKS him as they HURTLE through the air.
Diana watches Superman and the Ultimate CAREEN through th air from her WINDOW She looks toward her ARMOR ALTER.

Superman aims toward Centennial Park and they both CRASH down into the PARK'S LAKE. There is a momentary calm before Superman ERUPTS from the water and CAREENS through the air and SMASHES into a SKYSCRAPER before falling to the streets below. He SLAMS into the ground and the street CRUMBLES beneath him. The Ultimate EMERGES from the Lake and STOMPS his way tow the POPULATED CITY BLOCKS.
Lois EXITS her APARTMENT building and out into the street where PEOPLE are running in PANIC. She pulls out her Cellphone and makes a call.

location: BULLPEN, DAILY PLANET OFFICES, LEXCORP PLAZA --

text: The Office is in CHAOS. Everybody is RUNNING back and for Jimmy makes his way through the INSANITY.
What the hell is going on? An OFFICE WORKER dashes past.
(frantic) It's another attack!

location: PERRY WHITE'S OFFICE, DAILY PLANET OFFICES, LEXCORP

text: Perry's phone RINGS and he SNATCHES it up. It's Lois.
Lane? Are you seeing this?  129.
Perry. You need to evacuate now!
(over phone) What's happening?
I don't know. But it's bad.
(over phone) Where are you?
Outside my building.
(over phone) Stay there. I'll send someone for you.

location: BULLPEN, DAILY PLANET OFFICES, LEXCORP PLAZA --

text: Perry SWINGS his Office door open.
(shouts) Olsen!
Here Chief.
I have a job for you.

location: CARPARK, DAILY PLANET OFFICES, LEXCORP PLAZA --

text: Jimmy drives his Car at BREAKNECK SPEED out of the Carpar and SPEEDS towards Downtown Metropolis.
Superman CRAWLS from the CRATER. He's BLEEDING from his mouth. He wipes the BLOOD away. With his SUPER HEARING he HEARS the FRIGHTENED voices of Metropolis Citizens.
(frightened, screaming) Oh my God!... What is that thing! Run!... Not again!  130. The Ultimate's ROARS echo through the City. Superman stands and takes to the air.
FOUR MILITARY HELICOPTERS fly toward the City.
Stewart is SUITED up and WIELDS a MACHINE GUN. He speaks a SQUAD of MARINES.
This thing is big and bad and was made to go toe to toe with Superman. We have armor units en route. We stay behind the big guns and help civilians if can. A YOUNG MARINE raises his hand.
(scared) If this thing can take on the Superman. What can we do?
You keep shooting until the thing drops son.
(shouts) 3 minutes! The Marines LOCK and LOAD.

The Ultimate is DESTROYING everything it can see. People SCREAM as they flee the Creature's RAMPAGE. A FAMILY CAR (MOTHER, FATHER, DAUGHTER) comes to a SCREECHING HALT. The Monster PICKS UP the Car and THROWS it toward a building. The Family SCREAM. Superman appears and CATCHES the vehicle before it can COLLIDE with the building. He puts it down safely.
Get your family out of here! The Father SLAMS his foot on the ACCELERATOR and the car TEARS off.  131. The Ultimate sees Superman and CHARGES him. They renew th BATTLE.
Jimmy's Car pulls up beside Lois and he opens the passeng door.
Get in. Lois jumps in and shuts the door.
I need you to take me... Jimmy cuts her off.
Downtown. I figured. Lois is taken aback.
Good boy. Now lets go. Jimmy hits the gas and they drive towards Downtown which PLUMES of SMOKE rising from it.

Superman and the Ultimate are LOCKED in COMBAT. Superman is giving his all. Hitting the Creature as HARD he can. But the Ultimate simply SHRUGS off the STRIKES an RETALIATES. It's blows HURTING Superman MORE and MORE. BYSTANDERS hide in STORES and APARTMENT BUILDINGS. Some h behind CARS and Peek out of ALLEYS. A M.C.P.D Patrol Car pulls up nearby and Harper and Gardn hop out with their GUNS in hand.
(shocked) Holy shit!

Ok Kid. The Blue guy's got this. Lets get these people to safety. The Ultimate KICKS Superman in the GUT sending him FLYING towards the Patrol Car. Harper PUSHES Gardner out of the way. The Kryptonian SMASHES into it destroying it.  132. Harper and Gardner watch as the Ultimate RUNS past and SP TACKLES the Man of Steel.
(matter of fact) I don't think there's anywhere that's safe Jim. Harper stands and PULLS Gardner to his feet. They both begin to USHER the Bystanders away from the BATTLE.
Jimmy HITS the BRAKES as they arrive at the scene of DESTRUCTION. Jimmy sees Superman and the Ultimate TRADING BLOWS.
(shocked) What the hell is that thing? Louis jumps out of the car. Jimmy grabs his Camera from t back seat and follows her. Overhead NEWS STATION HELICOPTERS hover and FILM the scen

Superman is SLAMMED to the ground. He SWINGS around and lands a devastating RIGHT CROSS on the Ultimate's JAW. The Monster STAGGERS backwards then STEADIES itself and H Superman back REPEATEDLY. With each BLOW Superman is FORCED further back.

Bruce Watches the news footage of Superman's battle with Ultimate. It is clear Superman is LOSING. The sound of a CANE hitting the floor DRAWS his attention away from the images on screen. Behind him stands Alfred, leaning on a CANE. He's WEAK bu RECOVERING. He is looking at the footage, CONCERNED. Bruce turns back to the report. His expression one of DETERMINATION.  133.
Martha is watching the scene on TV, TERRIFIED for her Son
Stewart and his Troops march through the destruction and close in on the SUPER POWERED COMBATANTS. Stewart gestures his Squad to HOLD their position. He uses his RADIO to contact S.T.A.R Labs.
The Hamilton Room has been turned into a makeshift WAR RO Silas, looking GRAVE, is standing among the other SCIENTI watching the scene on a HUGE SCREEN. Swanwick enters the room answers Stewart.
(to Swanwick) We have a direct line to the Pentagon. Stewart is leading an assault.
Patch me through
General.
Talk to me soldier.
We have feet on the ground. Superman and Waller's pet are throwing down.
And?
(grave) Waller made good on her promise.
Hold your position. Artillery is en route. Silas gets a CALL on his Cell. He answers. His face TWIST into a look of pure HORROR and he hangs up and RUSHES fro the room.  134.

Superman has the Ultimate in a FULL NELSON. He tries to WRESTLE the Creature to the ground. The Monster GRABS Superman's arms and with his SUPERIOR STRENGTH he pulls himself free of the Man of Steel's GRIP then he grabs the Kryptonian and PILE DRIVES him into the CONCRETE. The Creature ROARS in TRIUMPH. BOOM! An ARTILLERY SHELL EXPLODES against the Monster's back. Several TANKS have arrived and are FIRING on the Ultimate Stewart and his Troops OPEN FIRE. The BARRAGE of FIRE POWER is RELENTLESS. SMOKE and FIRE obscure the Creatures shape. The Tank's and the Soldiers DEPLETE their AMMO and CEASE FIRE. There is an EERIE CALM as the DUST settles. Stewart LOWERS his Weapon and SQUINTS as a SHAPE emerges from the SMOKE. The Ultimate is COMPLETELY UNHARMED. Only the UPPER SECTI of it's Containment Suit has been TORN AWAY revealing it' MUSCULAR GREY FRAME which is COVERED in SHARP SHARDS of BONE.

(worried) We're going to need a bigger gun. The Ultimate ROARS and ATTACKS the Tanks RIPPING them to SHREDS. The Marines DIVE to COVER as the Monster SWINGS a TANK by it's CANNON through a building sending GLASS and CONCRETE flying. Superman RAISES up from the ground. He's WEAK and BLEEDIN He charges the Ultimate and THROWS PUNCH after PUNCH. His STRIKES appear FUTILE against the Monster who FIGHTS back
Mercy watches the CHAOS play out.
(concerned) Are you sure this is going to work?  135.
Of course. It kills Superman. We kill it. The world knows who it's true hero is. (smiles) It's only a matter of time.
Stewart DUCKS into a DEMOLISHED STORE FRONT where he find Gardner and Harper are also taking cover. The Cop's and Soldier STARE at each other for a moment.
You need to radio ahead and have your guys evacuate as many people as possible and set up a perimeter for at least five city blocks.
I think pretty much everybody for ten blocks has hightailed it out of here. (looks at Gardner) Well the smart ones anyway.

he stood for us. He fought for US... Behind him covered in WHITE SHEET is a STATUE.
he died for us. The Mayor gestures the SHEET be REMOVED.

John.
Kyle.

Kal El is dead. The Emerald Man's face HARDENS.

Am I being called back?

Thanagar has fallen. We can't hold him back any longer. (turns and walks away) Uxas is coming. Rayner FLICKERS and FADES leaving Stewart alone.

Bruce Wayne and Alfred stand beside a HUGE INACTIVE SEARCHLIGHT. In the distance LexCorp Tower can be seen. Wayne hears the SOUND of soft FOOTFALLS behind him. He and ALfred turn to see Diana approach.
I wasn't sure you'd come. She joins them beside the Searchlight.

Being a hero isn't about the lives you save but what you are willing to sacrifice to save them. Clark knew that in the end. He places his hand on the Searchlight's SWITCH.
What are you doing?
I won't let his sacrifice be in vain. I'm going to let someone know that he didn't win. He HITS the switch and the Searchlight ACTIVATES.  151.
